GSP33brsgor1u:2906: tarhi pratyagātmani samanvayo na tu brahmaṇi, tatrāha-ayamiti //29//
GSP33brsgor1u:2914: vijñeyendrastutyartha upanyāso na cetkathaṃ tarhi sa iti
GSP33brsgor1u:2925: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt |
GSP33brsgor1u:2926: dehotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgaṃ kiṃ na syāt, tatrāha-śarīradhāraṇaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:2927: sarve vāgādayaḥ prāṇā ahamahaṃ śreṣṭha iti vivadamānāḥ prajāpatimupajagmuḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:2928: sa ca tānuvāca, yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataraṃ patiṣyati sa vaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:2929: śreṣṭha iti tathākrameṇa vāgādipūtkrānteṣvapi mūkādibhāvena śarīraṃ svasthamasthāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:2930: mukhyaprāṇasya tu uccikramiṣāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ vyākulatvāptau tānvāgādīnvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca, yūyaṃ mohaṃ māpadyatha yato
GSP33brsgor1u:2932: kiṃ tat, pañcadhā prāṇāpānādibhāvenātmānaṃ vibhajya etadvāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśritya dhārayāmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:2940: naca svatantrapadārthabhedādvākyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:2943: nahi pradhānavākyārthabrahmaliṅgamanyathā netuṃ śakyaṃ, na vā taducitamityāha-naca brahmaliṅgamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:2945: anyatra 'ata eva prāṇaḥ'ityādau vṛtterāśritvādihāpi tasya brahmaliṅgasya
GSP33brsgor1u:2949: yasminnetau preryatvena sthitau tenetareṇa brahmaṇā sarve prāṇādivyāpāraṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:2951: 'vatkāraṃ vidyāt'iti na vakturjñeyatvamucyate, tasya lokasiddhatvāt, kintu tasya brahmatvaṃ bodhyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:2953: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate svakāryābhimukhyena preryate tadeva vāgādiragamyaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:2965: tasyāḥ saṃbhandhīni dṛśyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yathaikaṃ bhavantyadhiṣṭhānacidātmanā tathā vyākhyāsyāma
GSP33brsgor1u:2971: tatra karmendriyeṣu vāgevāsyāḥ prajñāyā ekamaṅgaṃ dehārdhamadūduhat pūrayāmāsa /
GSP33brsgor1u:2974: tasyāḥ punarnāma kila cakṣurādinā prativihitā jñāpitābhūtamātrā rūpādyartharūpā parastādaparārdhe kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:2976: evaṃ buddheḥ sarvārthadraṣṭṛtvamupapādya tanniṣṭhacitpratibimbadvārā sākṣiṇi draṣṭṛtvādhyāsamāha-prajñayeti
GSP33brsgor1u:2977: buddhidvārā cidātmā vācamindriyaṃsamāruhya tasyāḥ prerako bhūtvā vācā karaṇena sarvāṇi nāmāni vaktavyatvenāpnoti, cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇi
GSP33brsgor1u:2979: tathāca sarvadraṣṭṛtvaṃ cidātmani draṣṭṛtvādhyāsanimittatvaṃ ca buddherdharma ityuktaṃ bhavati sarvādhāratvāndatvādiḥ brahmadharma ityāha-tā vā iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:2981: prajñā indriyajātyā adhikṛtya grāhyā bhūtamātrā vartante, prajñāmātrā indriyāṇi grāhyaṃ bhūtajātamadhikṛtya vartanta iti grāhya grāhakayormithaḥ sāpekṣatvamuktaṃ sādhayati-yaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:2983: grāhyeṇa grāhyasvarūpaṃ na sidhyati kintu grāhakeṇa /
GSP33brsgor1u:2985: tasmātsāpekṣatvādetadgrāhyagrāhakadvayaṃ vastuto na bhinnaṃ kintu cidātmanyaropitamityāha-
GSP33brsgor1u:2998: naca 'taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva'ityatra māmiti jīvena, āyuriti prāṇena,
GSP33brsgor1u:3002: ata upāsanāvidhilubdhena 'vaktāraṃ vidyāt' 'etadevokthamupāsīta' 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt'iti jīvaprāṇabrahmopāsanavidhayaḥ, anye guṇavidhaya iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3007: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhāyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor1u:3016: tadupajīvyottaraṃ pādadvayaṃ pravartata iti hetuhetumadvāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3022: tasmājjāyata iti tajjaṃ, tasmiṃllīyata iti tallaṃ, tasminnaniti ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ, tajjaṃ ca tallaṃ ca tadanaṃ ceti tajjalān /
GSP33brsgor1u:3032: iha yadhyāyati, mṛtvā dhyānamahimnā tadhyeyarūpeṇa jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3036: pūrvatra brahmaliṅgairabrahmaliṅgabādha uktaḥ, na tathehopakrame brahmaṇo
GSP33brsgor1u:3039: ato jīvaliṅgaṃ balīya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-śārīra ityādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:3045: atra prayojanābhāve 'pi yatra prayojanaṃ tatra bhavatyeva jagadviśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3047: atra bādhāyāṃ samānādhikaraṇadārḍhyārthaṃ viśeṣaṇamāvaśyakaṃ, tadvākyasya jñeyabrahmaviṣayatvāt
GSP33brsgor1u:3057: sarvatra prasidvabrahmaṇa evātropāsyatvopadeśānna jīva upāsya iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3059: yatra phalaṃ nocyate tatra pūrvottarapakṣasidviḥ phalamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3060: tadyapi nirākāṅkṣaṃ brahma tathāpi manaḥpracuramupadhirasya, prāṇaḥ śarīramasyeti samāsāntargatasarvanāmnaḥ saṃnihitaviśeṣyākāṅkṣatvādbrahma saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:3061: 'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ karomi'iti saṃskārārthasadanasya nirākāṅkṣasyāpi 'tasminsīda'iti sākāṅkṣatacchabdena parāmarśadarśanādityāha-atrocyata iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3064: idaṃ hi liṅgadvayaṃ lokasidvaṃ jīvaṃ na saṃnidhāpayati,
GSP33brsgor1u:3072: vastuno vivakṣāyāḥ phalamupādānaṃ svīkāraḥ, sa ca prakṛteṣu guṇeṣvastīti vivakṣopacāra ityāha-tathāpyupādāneneti
GSP33brsgor1u:3073: nanvidaṃ grāhyamidaṃ tyājyamiti dhīrvivakṣādīnā vede kutaḥ syādityata
GSP33brsgor1u:3081: jīrṇaḥ sthaviro yo daṇḍena vañcati gacchati so 'pi tvameva /
GSP33brsgor1u:3083: sarvataḥ sarvāsu dikṣu śrutayaḥ śrotrāṇyasyeti sarvataḥ śrutimat /
GSP33brsgor1u:3088: nanu jīvadharmaścebrahmaṇi yojyante tarhi brahmadharmā eva jīve kimiti na
GSP33brsgor1u:3092: kalpitasya dharmā adhiṣṭhāne saṃbadhyante, nādhiṣṭhānadharmāḥ kalpita iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3095: ṭavāgeva vākaḥ so 'syāstīti vākī, na vākī avākī /
GSP33brsgor1u:3099: jyāyastvādyanupapattau śārīra iti paricchedo hetuḥ sūtroktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3116: smṛtau hṛdisthasya jīvādbhedokterannāpi hṛdistho manomaya īśvara
GSP33brsgor1u:3120: atra sūtrakṛtā satyabheda ukta iti bhrāntinirāsāyekṣatyadhikaraṇe nirastamapi codyamudbhāvya nirasyati-atrāhetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3121: tvaduktarītyā vastuta ekatvameva, bhedastu kalpitaḥ sūtreṣvanūdyata
GSP33brsgor1u:3125: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca |
GSP33brsgor1u:3126: arbhakamoko yasya sor'bhakaukāḥ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmādārthikamalpatvam
GSP33brsgor1u:3131: paricechedatyāgaṃ vinā brahmatvāsaṃbhavāt tattyāge ca brahmaṇa evopāsyatvamāyātīti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3142: brahmaṇo hārdatve 'niṣṭasaṃbhogāpatterjīva eva hārda upāsya iti śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-vyomavaditi
GSP33brsgor1u:3143: brahma bhoktṛ syāta, hārdatve sati cetanatvāt, jīvābhinnatvācca jīvavadityuktaṃ nirasyati-na
GSP33brsgor1u:3150: kiñca vibhavo bahava ātmāna iti vādināmekasmindehe sarvātmanāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3151: bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ, svakarmārjita eva dehe bhoga iti parihāraśca tulya iti na vayaṃ paryanuyojyā ityāha-sarvagateti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3153: brahmaṇo jīvābhinnatvaṃ śrutyā niścitya tena bhoktṛtvānumāne
GSP33brsgor1u:3155: arthaṃ mukhamātraṃ jaratyā vṛddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅgānīti so
GSP33brsgor1u:3158: na hyabhedamaṅgīkṛtyābhoktṛtvaṃ tyaktuṃ yuktaṃ, śrutyaivābheda siddhyarthaṃ bhoktṛtvavāraṇādityāha-śāstraṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3159: nanvekatvaṃ mayā śrutyā na gṛhītaṃ, yonopajīvyabādhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3164: brahmaṇo hārdatve bādhakābhāvacchāṇḍilyavidyāvākyaṃ brahmaṇyupāsye samanvitamiti sidvam //8//
GSP33brsgor1u:3172: 'bhedakalpanayā vartate tacchudvaṃ brahma itthā itthaṃ īśvarasyāpyadhiṣṭhānabhūtaṃ ko veda
GSP33brsgor1u:3179: pūrvatra brahmaṇo bhoktṛtvaṃ nāstītyuktaṃ, tadupajīvya pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3185: guṇaścātra mṛtyūpasecanapadena saṃnidhāpitaṃ prasidvaudanagataṃ vināśyatvaṃ gṛhyate, gauṇaśabdasya saṃnihitaguṇagrāhitvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3186: tathāca sarvasya vināśyatvena bhānālliṅgādīśvaro 'ttetyāhanaiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3193: ṛtamavaśyaṃbhāvi karmaphalaṃ pibantau bhuñjānau, sukṛtasya karmaṇo loke
GSP33brsgor1u:3194: kārye dehe parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3195: paramaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tasminyā guhā nabhorūpā vudvirūpā vā tāṃ praviśya sthitau chāyātapavat mitho virudvau tau brahmavidaḥ karmiṇaśca vadanti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3202: manuṣye prete mṛte sati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ paraloke bhoktāstītyeke,
GSP33brsgor1u:3207: chatripadena gantāra iva pibatpadenājahallakṣaṇayā praviṣṭāvucyete ityāha-atrocyata iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3210: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3215: edhāṃsi kāṣṭhāni pacantītyākhyātena kārakatvaṃ lakṣyaṃ, prakṛtistu mukhyaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3220: ekasmiñjātimati kḷpte sajātīyameva dvitīyaṃ grāhyaṃ, vyaktimātragrahe lāghavāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3222: na cāstu kārakatvena sajātīyā budvireva jīvasya dvitīyeti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3224: tathāca loke dvitīyasyāntaraṅgajātimattvadarśanājjīvasya dvitīyaścetana eveti sūtrārthamāha-saṃkhyāśravaṇe ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3225: guhāyāṃ budvau sthitaṃ, gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ purāṇamanādipuruṣaṃ viditvā harṣaśokau jahāti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3226: parame śreṣṭhe, vyoman hārdākāśe yā guhā buddhiḥ tasyāṃ nihitaṃ brahma yo
GSP33brsgor1u:3233: sa jīvo 'dhvanaḥ saṃsāramārgasya paramaṃ pāraṃ, kiṃ tat,
GSP33brsgor1u:3235: durdarśaṃ durjñānaṃ, tatra heturgūḍhaṃ māyāvṛtaṃ māyānupraviṣṭaṃ paścādguhāhitaṃ guhādvārā gahvareṣṭhaṃ, evaṃ bahirāgatamātmānaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3236: adhyātmayogaḥ sthūlasūkṣmakāraṇadehalayakrameṇa pratyagātmani cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3237: ṛtapānamatre jīvānuvādena vākyārthajñānāya tatpadārtho brahma pratipādyata
GSP33brsgor1u:3248: anīśayā svasyeśvaratvāpratītyā dehe nimagnaḥ puruṣo jīvaḥ śocati /
GSP33brsgor1u:3251: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ śodhitacinmātraṃ pratyaktvena paśyati tadāsya mahimānaṃ svarūpameti prāpnotīva /
GSP33brsgor1u:3258: pūrvapakṣārthastadā syāt, yadyatra buddhibhinnaḥ saṃsārī pratipadyeta /
GSP33brsgor1u:3259: nahyatra saṃsārī vivikṣyate kintu śodhitastvamartho brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3263: nāhi jīvo buddhibhinna iti vivekamātreṇopasaṃhāro yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3265: avidyā viduṣi kimapi svakāryaṃ nādhvaṃsate na saṃpādayati, jñānāgninā svasyā eva dagdhatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3271: vastuto jīvasyābhoktṛtve bhoktṛtvadhīḥ kathamityata āha-idaṃ hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3277: tasmāt 'ṛtaṃ pibantau'iti vākyameva guhādhikaraṇaviṣaya iti sthitam //12//
GSP33brsgor1u:3283: tadakṣisthānamasaṅgatvena brahmaṇo 'nurūpaṃ yato 'sminkṣiptaṃ vartmanī pakṣmaṇī eva gacchatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3285: pūrvaṃ 'pibantau'iti prathamaśrutacetanatvānusāreṇa caramaśrutā guhāpraveśādayo nītāḥ, tadvadihāpi dṛśyata iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3286: cākṣuṣatvānusāreṇamṛtatvādayo dhyānārthaṃ kalpitatvena neyā iti dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brsgor1u:3293: 'mano brahmetyupāsīta'ityatra itipadasya pratyayaparatvāt, iha ca brahmetyuvācetyanvayena
GSP33brsgor1u:3307: anavakḷptiḥ akḷptakalpanā tadā bhavet, yadyatraiva nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavedityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3313: dhyānārthaṃ bhedakalpanayā sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtasya ya eṣa iti sarvanāmnābhidhānādantaraḥ paramātmā syāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3314: nanu prakaraṇātprabalena dṛśyatvaliṅgenopasthāpitaśchāyātmā sarvanāmārtha ityata āha-ācāryastviti
GSP33brsgor1u:3320: tathā cāgnibhiruktātmavidyāvākyasya gativākyenaikavākyatā vācyā, sā ca sarvanāmnā prakṛtātmagrahe nirvahatītyekavākyatānirvāhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vākyabhedakālliṅgadbalavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3322: prāṇaśca sūtrātmā bṛhattvādbrahmeti yattajjānāmi, kaṃ viṣayasukhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśaṃ brahmatvena jñātuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3323: khaṃ kathaṃbhūtaṃ, yatkaṃ tadeva khamiti sukhena viśeṣitasya khasya
GSP33brsgor1u:3325: tathā kaṃ kathaṃbhūtaṃ, yatkhaṃ tadeva kamiti vibhutvena viśeṣitasya kasya
GSP33brsgor1u:3332: nanvekaṃ brahmaivātra dhyeyaṃ cedbrahmapadāntaraṃ kimarthamityata āha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3338: pṛthivyagnirannamāditya iti mama catasrastanavo vibhūtiriti gārhapatya upadideśa /
GSP33brsgor1u:3339: āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā ityanvāhāryapacana uvāca /
GSP33brsgor1u:3340: prāṇa ākāśo dyaurvidyuditi svamahimānamāhavanīyo jagādeti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3349: śrutā anuṣṭhitā upaniṣat rahasyaṃ saguṇabrahmopāsanaṃ yena tasya yā gatiḥ śrutau smṛtau ca prasidvā tasyā atrābhidhānālliṅgaditi
GSP33brsgor1u:3354: svadharmastapaḥ tapobrahmacaryaśraddhāvidyābhirātmānaṃ dhyātvā tayā dhyānavidyayottaraṃ devayānamārgaṃ prāpyate nottareṇa pathā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3355: ādityadvārā saguṇabrahmasthānaṃ gacchanti, etadvai brahma prāṇānāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3358: ataḥ kāryaṃ brahma prāpya tatsvarūpaṃ nirguṇaṃ jñātvā mucyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3359: agnireva jyotirdevatā evamaharādyā devatā eva smṛtāvuktāḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3360: asminnupāsake mṛte sati yadi putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃskārādikaṃ kurvanti yadi ca na kurvanti ubhayathāpyupāstimahimnā arcirādidevānkrameṇa gacchanti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3361: ārciṣamagniṃ, tato 'haḥ, ahnaḥ śuklapakṣaṃ, tatra uttarāyaṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3362: tasmātsaṃvatsaraṃ, tato devalokaṃ, tato vāyuṃ, vāyorādityaṃ, tataścandraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3363: candrādvidyutaṃ gatvā tatra vidyulloke sthitānupāsakānamānavaḥ puruṣo brahmalokādāgatya kāryaṃ brahmalokaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brsgor1u:3366: ta etatkāryaṃ brahma pratipadyamānā upāsakā imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ āvartaṃ janmamaraṇāvṛttiyuktaṃ nāvartante nāgacchantītyarthaḥ //16//
GSP33brsgor1u:3374: naca tasya svacakṣuṣā darśanaṃ saṃbhavatītyāha-ya eṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3383: nanu 'cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata''sūryo 'stameti'iti vākyaṃ amarā devā iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3387: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3390: tasyaśāstre śrutasya śāstrameva karaṇaṃ kalpyaṃ, saṃnidhānāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3391: tathāca śāstrakaraṇako vidvadanubhava upāsanāstutyartha ucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3399: 'yaḥ pṛthivyām'ityādinā devatāḥ pṛthivyādyā adhikṛtya yamayitā śrūyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:3408: avāntaraphalaṃ tu pūrvapakṣe anīśvaropāstiḥ, sidvānte pratyagbrahmajñānamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3412: pṛthivī yasya devasyāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ, lokyate 'neneti lokaścakṣuḥ, jyotiḥ sarvārthaprakāśakaṃ mana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3418: īśvaro na niyantā, aśarīratvāt, ghaṭavadiyuktaṃ nirasyati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3424: vastutastu cetanasāṃnidhyājjaḍasya vyāpāro niyamanaṃ tacchaktimattvaṃ niyantṛtvaṃ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3426: nanu dehaniyanturjīvasyānyo niyantā cettasyāpyanya ityanavasthetyata āha-tasyāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3427: niraṅkuśaṃ sarvaniyantṛtvamīśvarasya śrutaṃ, tasya niyantrantarānumāne śrutibādha dati nānavasthetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3432: pradhānaṃ mahadādikrameṇa kathaṃ pravartata iti tarkasyāviṣaya
GSP33brsgor1u:3434: rūpādihīnatvādavijñeyaṃ, sarvato dikṣu prasuptamiva tiṣṭhati jaḍatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3435: atat apradhānaṃ cetanaṃ, tasya dharmāṇāmabhidhānāditi hetvarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brsgor1u:3442: yathā devadattakartṛkagamanakriyāyā grāmaḥ karma na devadattaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3443: tathātmakartṛkadarśanādikriyāyā anātmā viṣayaḥ na tvātmā, kriyāyāḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3445: kriyāyāṃ guṇaḥ kartā, pradhānaṃ karma, tatraikasyāṃ kriyāyāmekasya guṇatvapradhānatvayorvirodhānna kartuḥ karmatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3446: dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāramātmānaṃ tayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na viṣayīkuryā ityādiśruteścādṛṣṭatvādidharmāḥ śārīrasyetyāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3449: nanvatraiko bhoktā jīvaḥ, īśvarastvabhokteti na virodha iti śaṅkate-kā
GSP33brsgor1u:3455: tasmātsūtre, 'ya ātmāni tiṣṭhan'iti śrutau ca draṣṭṛbhedoktirayuktā,
GSP33brsgor1u:3456: 'nānyaḥ'iti vākyaśeṣe bhedanirāsāditi prāpte, bheda upādhikalpitaḥ śrutisūtrābhyāmanūdyata iti samādhatte-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3457: bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-eko hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3468: karma vidyārūpāparavidyoktyanantaraṃ yayā nirguṇaṃ jñāyate parā socyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:3470: adreśyaṃ adṛśyaṃ jñānendriyaiḥ, agrāhyaṃ karmendriyaiḥ, gotraṃ vaṃśaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3475: bhūtānāṃ yoniṃ prakṛtiṃ yatpaśyanti dhīrāḥ paṇḍitāstadakṣaraṃ tadvidyā paretyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3481: nanu pūrvaṃ nirastaṃ pradhānaṃ kathamutthāpyate, tatrāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3482: atra pradhāne virudhyamāno 'saṃbhāvito vākyaśeṣaḥ śruta iti śaṅkate-nanu
GSP33brsgor1u:3484: pañcamyantākṣaraśrutyā bhūtaprakṛteḥ pratyabhijñānātprathamāntaparaśabdoktasya jagannimitteśvarasya sarvajñatvādikamityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3485: 'saṃdigdhe tu vākyaśeṣāt'iti nyāyena siddhāntayati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3487: vākyaśeṣādīśvaratvanirṇaya ityayuktaṃ, vākyaśeṣe bhūtayoneḥ pratyabhijñāpakābhāvāditi śaṅkate-nanviti
GSP33brsgor1u:3488_0: 'janikartṛḥ prakṛtiḥ'iti sūtreṇa prakṛterapādānasaṃjñāyāṃ pañcamīsmaraṇādakṣarātsaṃbhavatīti prakṛtitvenoktākṣarasya bhūtayonirvākyaśeṣe
GSP33brsgor1u:3490: etatkāryaṃ brahma sūkṣmātmakaṃ nāma rūpaṃ, sthūlaṃ tato 'nnaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3498: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ bhūtayoniṃ sarvajñaṃ puruṣaṃ veda tāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogyāya śiṣyāya prabrūyādityupakramya 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhraḥ'
GSP33brsgor1u:3500: tarhi pañcamyantākṣaraśabdārthaḥ ka ityāśaṅkyājñānamiti vakṣyata ityāha-kathamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3503: anityaphalatvenāparavidyāṃ ninditvā muktyarthine brahmavidyāṃ provāceti vākyaśeṣokterityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3505: nanu 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ'ityagre paravidyāviṣaya ucyate, adreśyavākyena tu pradhānavidyocyata ityata āha-tisraśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3509: evaṃ jīve jñāte tadakāryasya bhogyasya jñānaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3511: sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ samāptibhūmiṃ brahmavidyāmuvāca /
GSP33brsgor1u:3517: tathāhi ṛtuṣu yācayanti yajñaṃ kārayantītyṛtvijaḥ, yajata iti yajamānaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3519: yajñasaṃbandhe vihita iti patnī, evamṛtvigādināmapravṛttinimittaṃ yajña iti yajñarūpāḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3520: yeṣvavaramanityaphalakaṃ karma śrutyuktaṃ, etadeva karma śreyo
GSP33brsgor1u:3521: nānyadātmajñānamiti ye mūḍhāstuṣyanti te punaḥ punarjanmamaraṇamāpnuvantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3529: viśeṣaṇānna jīvo bhedokterna pradhānamiti hetudvayaṃ vibhajya
GSP33brsgor1u:3531_0: divyo dyotanātmakaḥ svayañjyotiḥ, amūrtaḥ pūrṇaḥ, puruṣaḥ puriśayaḥ pratyagātmā, bāhyaṃ sthūlamābhyantaraṃ kāraṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3531_1: tābhyāṃ sahādhiṣṭhānatvena tiṣṭhatīti sabāhyābhyantaraḥ, hi tathā śrutiṣu
GSP33brsgor1u:3542: bhūtānāṃ sūkṣmāḥ saṃskārā yatra tadbhūtasūkṣmaṃ īśvaraścinmātra āśrayo yasya tattathā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3544: yattu īśvara āśrayo viṣayo yasyeti nānājīvavādināṃ vyākhyānaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3554: naca vyavasthā nāstīti vācyaṃ, śravaṇe pravṛttyādibādhāpatāditi cet,
GSP33brsgor1u:3557: yasya jñānamantaḥkaraṇe jāyate tasyāntaḥ karaṇapariṇāmyajñānāṃśanaśo muktiriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3558: evaṃ ca śrotuḥ svarūpānandaprāptiḥ, śravaṇādo pravṛttiḥ, vidvadanubhavaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3562: nanu sūtrakṛtā śrutau pradhānādbhedavyapadeśa uktastatra kathamajñānādbhedoktirvyākhyāyate, tatrāha-nātreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3571: 'prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī'iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3578: yathā kaścibrahmavitsvasya sarvātmatvaprakaṭanārthamahamannamiti sāma gāyati na tvannatvādikamātmano vivakṣati, aphalatvāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:3581: eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā sūtrātmā etasmādbhūtayonerjāyata iti śrutyanvayena hiraṇyagarbhasyātra jāyamānatvenopanyāsādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3583: agnirdyuloko yasya, yasya samidrūpaḥ sūryaḥ so
GSP33brsgor1u:3586: ato madhye 'pi sṛṣṭireva vācyā na rūpamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3592: sa sūtrātmā dyāmimāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca sthūlaṃ sarvamadhārayat /
GSP33brsgor1u:3593: kaśabdasya prajāpatisaṃjñātve sarvanāmatvābhāvena smā ityayogādekāralopenaikasmai devāya prāṇātmane haviṣā vidhema paricaremeti
GSP33brsgor1u:3594: vyākhyeyaṃ, 'katama eko deva iti prāṇaḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3595: yadvā yasmādayaṃ jātastasmā ekasmai devāyetyarthaḥ, 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ'iti śrutyantarāt
GSP33brsgor1u:3597_1: samaṣṭiliṅgaśarīraṃ jāyate tadrūpasya sūtrātmanaḥ sarvabhūtāntarātmatvaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3599: karma saphalaṃ sarvaṃ śrautasmārtādikaṃ tapaśca puruṣa eveti sarvāntaratvarūpopanyāsācca bhūtayonau jñeye vākyaṃ samanvitamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3605: prācīnaśālasatyayajñendradyumnajanabuḍilā militvā mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ-'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma'iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3608: so 'pi samyaṅna vedeti tenoddālakena saha ṣaḍapyaśvapatiṃ kaikeyaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3613: te ca prācīnaśālādayaḥ krameṇa pratyekamūcuḥ-divamevāhaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedmi /
GSP33brsgor1u:3619_1: bhavanto yadi māmapṛṣṭvā dyusūryādiṣu bhagavato vaiśvānarasyāṅgeṣveva pratyekaṃ vaiśvānaratvadṛṣṭayo bhaveyustadā krameṇa
GSP33brsgor1u:3623: taṃ sarvajñaṃ sa tadupāsakaḥ sarvatra bhogaṃ bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3624: lokā bhūrādayaḥ, bhūtāni śarīrāṇi, ātmāno jīvā iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3625: suṣṭhu tejaḥ kāntiryasya dyulokasya sa sutejāḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3626: viśvāni rūpāṇyasya sūryasya, 'eṣa śukla eṣa nīlaḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3627: pṛthak nānāvidhaṃ vartma gamanaṃ ātmā svabhāvo yasya vāyoḥ sa nānāgatitvaguṇako 'sya prāṇaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3628: bahulatvaṃ vyāpitvaṃ tadguṇa ākāśo 'sya saṃdeho dehamadhyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3629: rayitvaṃ dhanatvaṃ tadguṇā āpo yasya bastirmūtrasthānam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3636: yadadyate tadannaṃ, yena pacyate so 'yaṃ puruṣaśarīre 'ntarastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3638: viśvasmai bhuvanāya vaiśvānaramagnimahnāṃ ketuṃ cihnaṃ sūryaṃ devā akṛṇvan kṛtavantaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3641: hi yasmātkaṃ sukhaprado bhuvanānāṃ rājā vaiśvānaro 'bhimukhā
GSP33brsgor1u:3642: śrīrasyetyabhiśrīrīśvaraḥ, tasmāttasya vaiśvānarasya sumatau vayaṃ syāma tasyāsmadviṣayā śubhamatirbhavatvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3646: atra jāṭharo vaiśvānara iti mukhyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3648: tasya dehavyāpitvādātmatvaṃ śrutyā dyumūrdhatvādikalpanayā bṛhattvādbrahmatvamiti dhyeyam
GSP33brsgor1u:3652: nanu nirviśeṣasya kuto viśeṣa ityata āha-atra hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3654: jāṭharasyāpi dhyānārthaṃ viśeṣakalpaneti cet, na, asatkalpanāpatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3658: yathāgnau nikṣiptamiṣīkātūlaṃ dahyate evaṃ hāsya viduṣa ityarthaḥ //24//
GSP33brsgor1u:3666: satā rūpeṇa stuti saṃbhavānnāsadāropa iti bhāvaḥ //25//
GSP33brsgor1u:3669: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād
GSP33brsgor1u:3675: bhaktamannaṃ, homīyaṃ homasādhanaṃ, tena prāṇāgnihotraṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3676_0: vājasaneyināmagnirahasye saprapañcāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāmuktvā 'sa yo haitamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3676_1: veda sa sarvatrānnamatti'ityuktaṃ dehāntaḥsthatvaṃ jāṭhare saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:3678: atra sūtre ādipadenaivāntaḥpratiṣṭhānasya grahe saṃbhavati pṛthaguktiḥ sādhāraṇaliṅgatvadyotanārthā
GSP33brsgor1u:3680: yadyapi dyumūrdhatvādiviśeṣa īśvarapakṣapātī homādhāratvādirjāṭharapakṣapātīti pratibhānaṃ samaṃ tathāpi pārameśvaro viśeṣo jāṭhare na saṃbhavatīti balavānityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3682: imāṃ pṛthivīṃ dyāmapi te eva dyāvāpṛthivyau rodasī tathormadhyamantarikṣaṃ ca yo bhūtāgnirbhānurūpeṇātatāna vyāptavān sa dhyātavya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3691: yat yaḥ, puruṣaḥ, sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaraśabditajāṭharopādhika iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3692: yo veda sa sarvatra bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3693: puruṣatvaṃ pūrṇatvamacetanasya jāṭharasya netyuktvā pāṭhāntare puruṣavidhatvaṃ dehākāratvaṃ tasya netyāha-ye tviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3696: na dehavyāpitvaṃ puruṣavidhatvaṃ kintu virāḍdehākāratvaṃ, adhidaivaṃ puruṣavidhatvamadhyātmaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3700: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca |
GSP33brsgor1u:3702: evaṃ jāṭharaṃ nirasya pakṣadvayaṃ nirasyati-ata eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3712_0: adhunā pratīkopādhiparītyāgena virāṭpuruṣākārasya bhagavato vaiśvānarasyādhyātmaṃ mūrdhādicubukānteṣu saṃpādyopāsyatvāṅgīkāre
GSP33brsgor1u:3712_1: 'pi na śabdādivirodhaḥ śabdayorīśvare yogavṛttyā mukhyatvāt, antaḥsthatvādīnāṃ ca tatra saṃbhavādityāha-sākṣādapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3715: idamantasthatvamudarasthatvarūpaṃ nocyate kintu nakhādiśikhāntāvayavasamudāyātmakapuruṣaśarīre mūrdhādicibukāntāṅgāni vṛkṣe śākhāvatpratiṣṭhitāni, teṣu saṃpanno vaiśvānaraḥ puruṣe
GSP33brsgor1u:3717: ato yathā śākhāsthasya pakṣiṇo vṛkṣāntaḥsthatvaṃ tathā vaiśvānarasya
GSP33brsgor1u:3727: viśve sarve narā jīvā asyātmatvena niyamyatvena vā santīti viśvānaraḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3731: aṅgayati gamayatyagraṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ prāpayatīti agniragraṇīruktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3739: upāsakānāṃ kṛte 'nugrahāya prādeśamātro 'bhivyajyate, pradeśeṣu vā mīyate
GSP33brsgor1u:3747: manaḥsthaṃ prādeśamātratvaṃ smṛtidvārā smaryamāṇe kalpitaṃ śruterālambanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3751: saṃpatter iti jaiminis tathā hi darśayati |
GSP33brsgor1u:3754_0: aparicchinnamapīśvaraṃ prādeśamātratvena saṃpattyā kalpitaṃ samyagviditavanto devāstameveśvaramabhi pratyaktvena saṃpannāḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3754_1: prāptavantaḥ, ha vai pūrvakāle, tato vo yuṣmabhyaṃ, tathā dyuprabhṛtīnavayavānvakṣyāmi yathā prādeśamātraṃ prādeśaparimāṇamanatikramya
GSP33brsgor1u:3754_2: mūrdhādyadhyātmāṅgeṣu vaiśvānaraṃ saṃpādayiṣyāmīti prācīnaśāladīnprati rājā pratijñāya svakīyamūrdhānamupadiśan kareṇa darśayannuvāca-eṣa
GSP33brsgor1u:3759: svakīyacakṣuṣī darśayan 'eṣa vai sutejāḥ sūryo vaiśvānarasya
GSP33brsgor1u:3761: nāsikāpadena tanniṣṭhaḥ prāṇe lakṣyate tasminnādhyātmikaprāṇe 'dhidaivaprāṇasya vāyordṛṣṭimāha-nāsika iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3763: mukhasthaṃ mukhyaṃ tasminnadhidaivaṃ bahulākaśadṛṣṭiḥ mukhasthalālārūpāsvapsu raiśabditatadīyabastisthodakadṛṣṭiḥ cibuke pratiṣṭhā pādarūpā pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3764: nanu guṇāvaiṣamyeṇa vidyayorbhedādagnirahasye śrutyanusāreṇa chāndogyasthaprādeśamātrakṣutiḥ kathaṃ vyākhyeyetyāśaṅkyāha-yadyapītyādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:3771: yadvā śākhābhedena guṇavyavasthāstu na vidyābheda iti bhāvaḥ //31//
GSP33brsgor1u:3776: ya eṣo 'nanto 'paricchinnaḥ ato 'vyakto durvijñeyastaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāmityatreḥ praśne yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ, sa īśvaro 'vimukte
GSP33brsgor1u:3780: tatra ca śrutau imāmeva bhrūsahitāṃ nāsikāṃ nirucyeti bhāṣyayojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3781: sarvānindrayakṛtāndoṣānvārayatīti varaṇā bhrūḥ, sarvāndoṣānnāśayatīti nāsī nāsiketi nirvacanaṃ śrutam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3783: tayormadhye 'pi viśiṣya jīvasya sthānaṃ pṛcchati katamaditi,
GSP33brsgor1u:3786: sa eṣa saṃdhirdyulokasya svargasya parasya ca brahmalokasya saṃdhitvena dhyeya ityāha-sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3787: ābhimukhyenāhaṃ brahmeti vimīyate jñāyate ityabhivimānaḥ pratyagātmā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3793: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor1u:3798: indrādivedyamakhilasya ca śāsitāraṃ jyotirnabhaḥ padamanidramajaṃ bhaje
GSP33brsgor1u:3802: evaṃ rūḍhipadabahulānāṃ prāyeṇa saviśeṣavākyānāṃ samanvayo dvitīyapāde darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3803: adhunā yaugikapadabahulānāṃ nirviśeṣapradhānānāṃ vākyānāṃ samanvayaṃ vaktuṃ tṛtīyaḥ pāda ārabhyate
GSP33brsgor1u:3806: brahmaparatvamuktaṃ, tadvadatrāpyupakramasthasādhāraṇāyatanatvasya vākyaśeṣasthasetuśrutyā vastutaḥ paricchinne pradhānādau vyavastheti
GSP33brsgor1u:3810: yasmin lokatrayātmā virāṭ, prāṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ saha manaḥ sūtrātmakaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3811: cakārādavyākṛtaṃ kāraṇamotaṃ kalpitaṃ tadapavādena tamevādhiṣṭhānātmānaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ jānatha śravaṇādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3812: anyā anātmavāco vimuñcatha viśeṣeṇa niḥśeṣaṃ tyajatha /
GSP33brsgor1u:3814: mokṣasyāsārāpāradurvārasaṃsāravāridheḥ parapārasya seturiva setuḥ prāpaka iti mātṛvacchrutirmumukṣūnupadiśati
GSP33brsgor1u:3816: amṛtasya brahmaṇaḥ seturiti ṣaṣṭhyā brahmaṇo bhinnatvena setoḥ śrutatvādeṣaśabdaparāmṛṣṭaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamabrahmaiva seturiva
GSP33brsgor1u:3825: yathā loke maṇayaḥ sūtreṇa grathitā evaṃ he gautama,
GSP33brsgor1u:3826: samaṣṭiliṅgātmakavāyunā sthūlāni sarvāṇi saṃdṛbdhāni grathitāni bhavantīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3830: upādhiparicchinnasya jīvasya sarvavastu pratyekaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3833: prajānāmūtpattau sadeva mūlaṃ, sthitāvāyatanaṃ, laye pratiṣṭheti brahmavācisatpadena chāndogye brahmaṇa āyatanatvaśruteratrāpi tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3835: 'yasmin dyauḥ'iti vākyātpūrvottaravākyayoḥ puruṣabrahmādiśabdena brahmasaṃkīrtanānmadhye 'pi brahma grāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3836: puruṣa iti pūrvavākyaṃ, brahmaivetyuttaravākyaṃ, sarvāsu dikṣu sthitaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3841: yasmin sarvamotaṃ tamevaikamityevakāraikaśabdābhyāṃ nirviśeṣaṃ jñeyamityuktvā hetvantaramāha-vikārānṛteti
GSP33brsgor1u:3842: vikāre 'nṛte kalpite abhisaṃdho 'bhimāno yasya tasyānarthabhāktvena nindāśruteśca kūṭasthasatyaṃ jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3844: yaścoraḥ sa sthāṇuritivat yatsarvaṃ tadbrahmeti sarvoddeśena
GSP33brsgor1u:3845: brahmatvavidhānādbādhanārthaṃ, na tu yadbrahma tatsarvamiti nānārasatvārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3849: yadyapi pāravattvasāvayavatvādikaṃ mukhyasetvavyabhicāri tathāpi setorjalādibandhanarūpaṃ yadvidhāraṇaṃ tadeva vyabhicāritve 'pi
GSP33brsgor1u:3853: atra śrutau pareṇeti śeṣaḥ vidhāraṇasya śabdārthatvaṃ sphuṭayati-ṣiñ iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3857: yadvā dyubhvādyādhāro brahma na setuśabdārthaḥ kintvavyavahitaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3864: muktairūpasṛpyaṃ pratyaktvena prāpyaṃ yadbrahma tasyātrokteriti sūtrārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3868_0: yathā nadyo gaṅgādyā nāmarūpe vihāya samudrātmanā tiṣṭhanti tathā brahmātmavidapi saṃsāraṃ vihāya parātkāraṇādavyaktātparaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3868_1: pūrṇaṃ svayañjyotirānandaṃ pratyaktvena prāpya tiṣṭhatītyāha-tathā vidvāniti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3869: idaṃ pradhānādeḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-brahmaṇaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3870: asya mumukṣoḥ, hṛdīti padenātmadharmatvaṃ kāmānāṃ nirastam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3872: na kevalamanarthanivṛttiḥ kintvatra dehe tiṣṭhanneva brahmānandamaśnuta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3874: dhīro vivekī tamevātmānaṃ vijñāya viśuddaṃ lakṣyapadārthaṃ jñātvā vākyārthajñānaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3878: jihvāmūlaṃ ca dantāśca nāsikoṣṭhau ca tālu ca //
GSP33brsgor1u:3894: nanu 'nānumānaprāṇabhṛtāvatacchabdāt'ityekameva sūtraṃ kimarthaṃ na kṛtaṃ ubhayanirāsahetorekatvādityata āha-pṛthagiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3902: yadyapi viśuddhaḥ pratyagātmaivātra jñeyaḥ tathāpi jīvatvākāreṇa jñāturjñeyādbhedānna jñeyarūpatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3903: evaṃ ca jīvatvaliṅgaviśiṣṭatvena jīvasya dyubhvādivākyarthatvaṃ nirasyate na śuddharūpeṇeti mantavyam //5 // //6//
GSP33brsgor1u:3907: nanu sthityeśvarasyādanājīvasya 'dvā suparṇā'ityatroktāvapi īśvara āyatanavākyena kimarthaṃ grāhya ityata āha-yadi ceśvara iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3908: atra ceśvaraḥ śuddhacinmātro grāhyaḥ, na sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3916: nanvatra jīveśau nānuvādyau, paiṅgivyākhyāvirodhādataḥ sūtrāsaṃgatirityata āha-yadāpīti
GSP33brsgor1u:3919: grāhyaṃ, na buddhyupahito jīva iti sūtrasaṃgatimāha-kathamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3920: nanvatrānupahito jīva ukto na paraṃ brahmetyata āha-yastviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3931: nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukham, tasmānniratiśayasukhārthinā bhūmaiva vicārya iti nāradaṃ prati sanatkumāreṇokte sati nārado brūte-bhūmānamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3936: bhū ca bahoḥ'iti sūtreṇa bahoḥ parasyemanicpratyayasyāderikārasya lepaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3937: syāt, bahoḥ sthāne bhūrityādeśaśca syādityukterbhūmanniti śabdo niṣpannaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:3940: vākyopakramastha ātmāpi svapratipādanāpekṣo dharmitvena bhātīti saṃnihitavyavahitaprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3945: pūrvottarapakṣayoḥ prāṇopāstiḥ brahmajñānaṃ ca phalaṃ krameṇa mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3947: bhūmā tu prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥprakṣaṃ vinaivoktaliṅgena prāṇādabhinna
GSP33brsgor1u:3949: prāṇādbhūya iti na dṛśyata iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3950: nanu 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇaprakaraṇavicchedānna prāṇo
GSP33brsgor1u:3952: nāmādyaśāntānupāsyānatītya prāṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vadatītyativādi prāṇavid taṃ prati ativādyasīti kenacitpraśne kṛte asmīti brūyāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:3954: prāṇavidameṣa iti parāmṛśya satyavacanadhyānamananaśraddhādidharmaparamparāṃ vidhāya bhūmopadeśānna prakaraṇavicchedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3956: bhūmno lakṣaṇavacanaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇe praśnapūrvakaṃ yojayatikathaṃ punarityādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:3957: prāṇagrasteṣu prāṇe līneṣu na śṛṇoti suṣuptapuruṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3958: 'gārhapatyo ha vā eṣo 'pāno vyāno 'nvāhāryapacana āhavanīyaḥ prāṇaḥ'iti
GSP33brsgor1u:3959: śruteḥ prāṇā agnaya iha pure śarīre jāgrati savyāpārā eva tiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3964: sarvaṃ samarpitamiti ca sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ prāṇaṃ svīkaroti śrutirityanvayaḥ ata ātmatvaṃ mukhyārthaṃ darśayati-saṃprasāda iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3965: sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde sthitvā punarādravatīti prayogācca /
GSP33brsgor1u:3974: prakṛtaprāṇavitparāmarśaka eṣaśabdo na bhavati, tasya yacchabdaparatantratvena satyavādajivācitvāt
GSP33brsgor1u:3976: satyenātivāditvaṃ viśeṣaḥ, tadvato ya eṣa ityukterna pūrvānukarṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3977: ya eṣa prāṇavidativadatītyanūdya sa satyaṃ vadediti vidhānānna prāṇaprakaraṇaviccheda iti dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3978: satyaśabdo hyabādhite rūḍho brahmavācakaḥ, tadanyasya mithyātvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3981: kiñca satyena brahmaṇātivadatīti tṛtīyāśrutyā brahmakaraṇakamativāditvaṃ śrutaṃ, tasya prakaraṇādbādho na yukta ityāha-śrutyā hītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3984: evaṃ satyeneti śrutyā prakaraṇaṃ bādhyamityuktvā tuśabdenāpi
GSP33brsgor1u:3990: yattu praśnaṃ vinoktatvaliṅgādbhūmā prāṇa iti, tanna,
GSP33brsgor1u:3992: praśnabhedādarthabheda iti na niyamaḥ, ekasyātmano maitreyyā bahuśaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4000: imānyati śravaṇādīni jñeyasya satyasya brahmatve liṅgāni /
GSP33brsgor1u:4001: evaṃ śrutiliṅgaiḥ prāṇasyāvāntaraprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā prastutaṃ satyaṃ brahma bhūmapadoktabahutvadharmītyāha-tatra yaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:4002: kiñca 'saṃnihitādapi vyavahitaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ balīyaḥ'iti nyāyena saṃnihitaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ prāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vākyopakramastha ātmā svapratipādanāya
GSP33brsgor1u:4003: bhūmavākyāpekṣa iha bhūmā grāhya ityāha-evaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4004: kiñca śokasya pāramityupakramya tamasaḥ pāramityupasaṃhārāt, śokasya mūlocchedaṃ vinā taraṇāyogācca, śokapadena mūlatamo gṛhyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:4007: nanvidaṃ caramaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahmaparamastu, tataḥ prāgukto bhūmā prāṇa iti śaṅkate-prakaraṇānta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4014: yaduktaṃ bhūmno lakṣaṇaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇeṣu yojyamiti tadanūdya vighaṭayati-yo 'pyasāvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4015: sati buddhyādyupādhāvātmano draṣṭṛtvādiḥ, tadabhāve suṣuptau tadabhāva
GSP33brsgor1u:4022: 'sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭāt'iti sarvagatatvaṃ, 'sa evedaṃ sarvam'iti
GSP33brsgor1u:4023: sarvātmatvaṃ ca śrutaṃ, tasmādbhūmādhyāyo nirguṇe samanvita iti siddham //9//
GSP33brsgor1u:4029: yadbhūtaṃ bhavacca bhaviṣyacca tatsarvaṃ kasminnotamiti gārgyā pṛṣṭhena muninā yājñavalkyenāvyākṛtākāśaḥ kāryamātrāśraya uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4030: ākāśaḥ kasminnota iti dvitīyapraśne sa muniruvāca,
GSP33brsgor1u:4033: yathā satyaśabdo brahmaṇi rūḍha iti brahma bhūmetyuktaṃ tathākṣaraśabdo varṇe rūḍha iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4034: tatra oṅkāropāstiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte nirguṇabrahmadhīriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4037: varṇasya oṅkārasya sarvāśrayatvaṃ kathamityāśaṅkya dhyānārthamidaṃ yathā śrutyantare sarvātmatvamityāha-oṅkāra iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4047: bhūtākāśasya kāryantaḥpātinaḥ śrutasarvakāryāśrayatvāyogādavyākṛtamajñānamevākāśaḥ pradhānaśabdita iti tadāśrayatvāccākṣaraṃ na pradhānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4057: tarhi śodhito jīva evākṣaraṃ na para ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4065: pippalādo guruḥ satyakāmena pṛṣṭo brūte, he satyakāma, paraṃ nirguṇamaparaṃ saguṇaṃ brahmaitadeva yo 'yaṃ oṅkāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4067_0: tasmātpraṇavaṃ brahmātmanā vidvānetenaiva oṅkāradhyānenāyatanena prāptisādhanena yathādhyānaṃ paramaparaṃ vānveti prāpnotīti
GSP33brsgor1u:4069: yo hyakārādimātrātraye ekasyā mātrāyā akārasya ṛṣyādikaṃ jāgradādivibhūtiṃ ca jānāti tena samyagjñātā ekā mātrā yasyoṅkārasya sa ekamātraḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4071: tamoṅkāraṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'bhidhyāyīta sa oṅkāravibhūtitvena dhyātaiḥ sāmabhiḥ sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā paramātmānaṃ puruṣamīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4074: pūrvatra pūrvapakṣatvenokte oṅkāre buddhisthaṃ dhyātavyaṃ niścīyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4075: yadvā pūrvatra varṇe rūḍhasyākṣaraśabdasya liṅgādbrahmaṇi vṛttiruktā,
GSP33brsgor1u:4076: tadvadatrāpi brahmalokaprāptiliṅgatparaśabdasya hiraṇyagarbhe vṛttiriti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tatrāparamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:4079: sūrye saṃpannaḥ praviṣṭaḥ nanu vasudāna īśvara iti dhyānādvindate vasvityalpamapi phalaṃ brahmopāsakasya śrutamityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4082: na cātra paraprāptirevokteti vācyaṃ, parasya sarvagatatvādatraiva prāptisaṃbhavena sūryadvārā gativaiyarthyāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4085: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamiti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4086: sūtre saśabda īśvarapara iti pratijñatatvena taṃ vyācaṣṭe-parameveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4087: sa upāsaka etasmādviraṇyagarbhātparaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmāhamitīkṣata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4089: nanvīkṣaṇaṃ pramātvādviṣayasatyatāmapekṣata iti bhavatu satyaḥ para īkṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4090: dhyātavyastvasatyo 'paraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-sa eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4091: śrutibhyāṃ pratyabhijñānātsa evāyamiti sautraḥ saśabdo vyākhyātaḥ atraivaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4092: sūtrayojanā-oṅkāre yo dhyeyaḥ sa para evātmā, vākyaśeṣe īkṣaṇīyatvokteḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4100: dhyānasya tatphalekṣaṇasya ca loke samānaviṣayatvāddhyeya evekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4103: saṃnihitataro brahmalokasvāmī parāmṛśyata iti praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe-kastarhītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4106: khilyavadalpo bhāvaḥ paricchedo yasya sa khilyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4107: etatpadena brahmaloko vā parāmṛśyata ityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4109: vyaṣṭikaraṇābhimānināṃ jīvānāṃ ghanaḥ saṃghāto yasminsarvakaraṇābhimānini sa jīvaghanaḥ tatsvāmikatvātparaṃparāsaṃbandhena loko lakṣya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4111: parapuruṣaśabdasya paramātmani mukhyatvācca sa eva dhyeya ityāha-paramiti
GSP33brsgor1u:4112: yasmātparaṃ nāparamasti kiñcit sa evaṃ mukhyaḥ paraḥ na tu piṇḍātparaḥ sūtrātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4113: kiñca paraśabdenopakrame niścitaṃ paraṃ brahmaivātra vākyaśeṣe
GSP33brsgor1u:4117: oṅkāre parabrahmopāsanayā sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā parabrahmekṣitvā tadeva śāntamabhayaṃ paraṃ prāpnotītyavirodhamāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4118: evamekavākyatāsamarthanaprakaraṇānugṛhītaparapuruṣaśrutibhyāṃ parabrahmapratyabhijñayā brahmalokaprāptiliṅgaṃ bādhitvā vākyaṃ praṇavadhyeye brahmaṇi samanvitamiti siddham //13//
GSP33brsgor1u:4126: asmin yatprasiddhaṃ daharamalpaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ tasminhṛdaye yadantarākāśaśabditaṃ brahma tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vicārya jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4127: atrākāśo jijñāsyaḥ, tadantaḥsthaṃ veti prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ kalpyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4135: tathehāpyākāśapadasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśo dhyeya iti dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brsgor1u:4137: daharavākyasyānantaraprajāpativākyasya ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvayokteḥ śrutyādisaṃgatayaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4143: nanu bhūtākāśasyālpatvaṃ kathaṃ, ekasyopamānatvamupameyatvaṃ ca kathaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4147: hṛdayāpekṣayā alpatvaṃ, dhyānārthaṃ kalpitabhedātsādṛśyaṃ, svata ekatvātsarvāśrayatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4148: nanu 'eṣa ātmā'ityātmaśabdo bhūte na yukta ityarūcerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4157: nanu jīvasyākāśapadārthatvamayuktamityāśaṅkya tarhi bhūtākāśa eva daharo
GSP33brsgor1u:4162: anveṣyatvādeḥ paraviśeṇatvena grahaṇāddarahasya brahmatve liṅgaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4165: tamācāryaṃ prati yadi brūyuḥ, hṛdayameva tāvadalpaṃ tatratyākāśo 'lpataraḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4166: kiṃ tadatrālpe vidyate yadvicāryā jñeyamiti, tadā sa ācāryo
GSP33brsgor1u:4174: na abhede sādṛśyasyānanvayena yuddhasya nirūpamatve tātparyādayamananvayālaṅkāra iti kāvyavidaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4180: kiñca hārdākāśasyāntaratvātyāge alpatvena vyāpakabāhyākāśasādṛśyaṃ na yuktamityāha-apiceti
GSP33brsgor1u:4182: nanu hārdākāśasyālpatvanivṛttau tāvattve ca tātparyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-ubhayeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4186: vigatā jighatsā jagdhumicchā yasya so 'yaṃ vijighatsaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4188: prathamaśrutabrahmaśabdena tatsāpekṣacaramaśrutaṣaṣṭhīvibhaktyarthaḥ saṃbandho neyaḥ, na tu brahmaṇaḥ puramiti ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ svasvāmibhāvo
GSP33brsgor1u:4189: grāhyaḥ 'nirapekṣeṇa tatsāpekṣaṃ bādhyam'iti nyāyādityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4190: śarīrasya brahmaṇa tadupalabdhisthānatvarūpe saṃbandhe mānamāha-sa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4191: pūrṣu śarīreṣu, puri hṛdaye śaya iti puruṣa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4192: nanu brahmaśabdasya jīve 'pyannādinā śarīravṛddhihetau mukhyatvānna ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ kathañcinneya ityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4193: bṛṃhayati dehamiti brahma jīvaḥ tatsvāmike pure hṛdayaṃ brahmaveśma bhavatu, rājapure maitrasadbhavadityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4195_0: atha karmaphalādvaurāgyānantaramiha jīvadaśāyāmātmānaṃ daharaṃ tadāśritāṃśca satyakāmādiguṇān ācāryopadeśamanuvidya dhyānenānubhūya
GSP33brsgor1u:4195_1: ye paralokaṃ gacchanti teṣāṃ sarvalokeṣvanantamaiśvaryaṃ svecchayā saṃcalanādikaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4196: dahare uktaliṅgānyanyathāsiddhāni teṣāṃ tadantaḥsthaguṇatvādiyuktaṃ smārayitvā dūṣayati-yadapītyādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:4202: sarvanāmabhyāṃ daharākāśamākṛṣyātmatvādiguṇānuktvā guṇaiḥ saha tasyaiva dhyeyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣo brūte tadvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4209: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca |
GSP33brsgor1u:4211: prajā jīvā etaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ daharaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ lokamaharahaḥ pratyahaṃ svāpe gacchantyastadātmanā sthitā apyanṛtājñānenāvṛtāstaṃ na jānanti ataḥ punaruttiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4212: nanvetatpadaparāmṛṣṭadaharasya svāpe jīvagamyatve 'pi brahmatve kimāyātamityaśaṅkya 'tathā hi dṛṣṭam'iti vyācaṣṭe-tathā hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4220: tatra niṣādānāṃ sthapatiḥ svāmīti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena traivarṇiko grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4222: na tu niṣādaścāsau sthapatiriti karmadhārayeṇa niṣādo grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4224: niṣāda eva sthapatiḥ syāt, niṣādaśabdasya niṣāde śaktatvāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:4225: tasyāśrutaṣaṣṭhyarthasaṃbandhalakṣakatvalpanāyogāt śrutadvitīyāvibhakteḥ pūrvapadasaṃbandhakalpanāyāṃ lāghavāt, ato niṣādasyeṣṭisāmarthyamātraṃ kalpyamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4233: nanvathaśabdāddaharaprakaraṇaṃ vicchidya śrutā dhṛtirna daharaliṅgamiti śaṅkate-kathamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:4237: sūtre tu mahimaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāddhṛtiśabdaḥ ktinnanto vidhāraṇaṃ brūte, 'striyāṃ ktin'iti bhāve ktino vidhānāditi vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4240: dhṛteśca daharaḥ paraḥ asya dhṛtirūpasya niyamanasya ca mahimno 'sminparamātmanyeva śrutyantara upalabdheriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4247: ā samantātkāśate dīpyata iti svayañjyotiṣi brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya vibhutvaguṇato vā prasiddhiḥ prayogaprācuryam //17//
GSP33brsgor1u:4255: ya eṣa saṃprasādo jīvo 'smātkāryakaraṇasaṃghātātsamyagutthāya ātmānaṃ tasmādvivicya viviktamātmānaṃ svena brahmarūpeṇābhiniṣpadya sākṣātkṛtya
GSP33brsgor1u:4257: yathā mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitīti vākyaṃ suptvā mukhaṃ vyādatte iti vyākhyāyate tadvat /
GSP33brsgor1u:4262: nanu kvāpyākāśaśabdo jīve na dṛṣṭa ityāśaṅkyoktāvasthotthānaliṅgabalātkalpya ityāha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4263: niyāmakābhāvājjīvo daharaḥ kiṃ na syāditi prāpte
GSP33brsgor1u:4281: mahīyamānaḥ vāsanāmayairviṣayaiḥ pūjyamāna iti svapnaparyāye, yadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4282: tatra kāle tadetatsvapanaṃ yathā syāttathā suptaḥ, samyak asto nirastaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4283: karaṇagrāmo yasya sa samastaḥ, ata evopahṛtakaraṇatvāttatkṛtakāluṣyahīnaḥ saṃprasannaḥ, svapnaṃ prapañcamajñānamātratvena vilāpayati ato
GSP33brsgor1u:4284: 'jñānasattvāt muktādvilakṣaṇaḥ prājña eṣa svacaitanyena kāraṇaśarīrasākṣī tasya sākṣyasya sattāsphūrtipradatvādātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4285: caturthaparyāye brahmoktestasyaivāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇā ityāśaṅkya tasyāpi paryāyasya jīvatvamāha-nāheti
GSP33brsgor1u:4287: khidyamāno hīndra uvāca, na khalu suptaḥ pumānayaṃ saṃprati suṣuptyavasthāyāmayaṃ devadatto 'hamityevamātmānaṃ jānāti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4288: no eva naivemāni bhūtāni jānāti kintu vināśameva prāpto bhavati, nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti doṣamupalabhya punaḥ prajāpatimupasasāra /
GSP33brsgor1u:4290: etasmātprakṛtādātmano 'nyatrānyaṃ na vyākhyāsyāmītyupakramya 'maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram'iti nindāpūrvakaṃ jīvameva darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4295: tarhi sūtre puṃliṅgena jīvoktiḥ kathaṃ, jñānena jīvatvasya nivṛttatvādityata āha-bhūtapūrveti
GSP33brsgor1u:4296: jñānātpūrvamavidyātatkāryapratibimbitatvarūpaṃ jīvatvamabhūditi kṛtvā jñānānantaraṃ brahmarūpo 'pi jīvanāmnocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4301: pratyuvāca, udaśarāva ātmānamavekṣya yadātmano rūpaṃ na vijānīthastanme
GSP33brsgor1u:4303: udakapūrṇe śarāve pratibimbātmānaṃ dehaṃ dṛṣṭvā svasyājñātaṃ yattanmahyaṃ vācyamityuktaśrutyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4307: jīvatvarūpeṇa jīvaṃ na vyācaṣṭe lokasiddhatvāt kintu tamanūdya parasparavyabhicāriṇībhyo 'vasthābhyo vivicya brahmasvarūpaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33brsgor1u:4308: ato yadbrahma tadevāpahatapāpmatvādidharmakaṃ na jīva ityuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:4316: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ jīvatvaṃ, vākyotthaprabhodhāttannivṛttau tannivṛttirityāvidyakaṃ tadityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4321: manaḥsaṅgino hi kriyayā malanāśādabhivyaktirna tu kūṭasthasyāsaṅgina
GSP33brsgor1u:4329: taccaitanyaṃ cakṣurādijanyavṛttivyaktaṃ dṛṣṭyādipadavācyaṃ sat vyavahārāṅgaṃ jīvasya svarūpaṃ bhavatīti tasyābhibhūtatve dṛṣṭo vyavahāro virudhyeta /
GSP33brsgor1u:4334: svarūpaṃ cejjñānina eva vyañjyeta jñānātpūrvaṃ vyavahārocchittirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4336: sadā vṛttiṣu vyaktasya vastuto 'saṅgasyātmana āvidyakadehādyavivekarūpasya malasaṅgasya sattvāttadvivekāpekṣayā
GSP33brsgor1u:4345: saśarīratvasya satyatvātsamutthānamutkrāntiriti vyākhyeyaṃ na viveka ityāśaṅkyāha-tathā viveketi /
GSP33brsgor1u:4349: nanu svakarmārjite śarīre bhogasyāparihāryatvātkathaṃ jīvata eva svarūpāvirbhāva ityata āha-śarīrastho 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4358: etadbhedasya satyatvameva nāstīti kuta ityanvayaḥ chāyāyāṃ brahmadṛṣṭiparamidaṃ vākyaṃ nābhedaparamityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4359: yasya jñānātkṛtakṛtyatā sarvakāmaprāptistamātmānamanvicchāva iti pravṛttayorindravirocanayoryadyanātmacchāyāṃ prajāpatirbrūyāttadā mṛṣāvādi syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4360: prathamavat dvitīyādiparyāye vyāvṛttāsvavasthāsu unusyūtātmā brahmatvenokta ityāha-tatheti
GSP33brsgor1u:4372: tava tu upakrāntaparamātmanaścaturtha evoktestadbāda ityāha-bhūya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4378: ye tu saṃsāraṃ satyamicchanti teṣāmidaṃ śārīrakamevottaramityāha-apare
GSP33brsgor1u:4383: brahmaivāvidyayā saṃsarati na tato 'nyo jīva iti śārīrakārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4384: tarhi sūtrakāraḥ kimiti bhedaṃ brūte, tatrāha-yasttviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4393: advaitamajānataḥ kalpitadvaitāśrayā vidhayo na viduṣa iti sarvamupapannamityarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brsgor1u:4397: evaṃ prajāpativākye jīvānuvādena brahmaṇa evāpahatapāpmatvādyukterjīve tadasaṃbhavānna jīvo dahara ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4407: evaṃ daharavākyaṃ prajāpativākyaṃ ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvitamiti siddham //21//
GSP33brsgor1u:4413: tasmin brahmaṇi viṣaye na bhāti, taṃ na bhāsayatīti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor1u:4414: yadā candrabhāskarādirna bhāsayati tadā alpadīpteragneḥ kā kathetyāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4418: tatreti saptamyāḥ sati viṣaye ca sādhāraṇyātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4420: tathehāpi satisaptamībalādvartamānārthatyāgena yasminsati sūryādayo na bhāsyanti sa tejoviśeṣa upāsya iti bhaviṣyadarthe vṛttirāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4421: adhunā bhāsamāne sūryādau na bhātīti virodhāditi dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brsgor1u:4426: yasminsati yanna bhāti tadanu tadbhātīti viruddhamityata āha-anubhānamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:4428: mukhyasaṃbhave vivakṣānupapatteḥ mukhyānubhānaliṅgātsarvabhāsakaḥ paramātmā svaprakāśako 'tra grāhya iti siddhāntamāha-prājña iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4434: yo 'yamanukaroti sa tajjātīya iti niyamo nāstītyāha-nāyamekānta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4444: tatreti sarvanāmaśrutyā prakṛtaṃ brahma grāhyamityāha-na tatra sūrya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4447: hiraṇmaye jyotirmaye annamayādyapekṣayā pare kośe ānandamayākhye pucchaśabditaṃ brahma virajaṃ āgantukamalaśūnyaṃ, niṣkalaṃ niravayavaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4450: sūryādyabhibhāvakatejodhātau prāmāṇike tasyeha grahaṇaśaṅkā syāt, na tatra pramāṇamastītyāha-tatreti
GSP33brsgor1u:4452: satisaptamīpakṣe na bhātīti śrutaṃ vartamānatvaṃ tyaktvā tasminsati na bhāsyantītyaśrutabhaviṣyattvaṃ kalpanīyaṃ pratyakṣavirodhanirāsāya /
GSP33brsgor1u:4453: viṣayasaptamīpakṣe tu na bhāsayatītyaśrutaṇijadhyāhāramātraṃ kalpyaṃ na śrutatyāga iti lāghavaṃ, ato brahmaṇi viṣaye sūryāderbhāsakatvaniṣedhena brahmabhāsyatvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4454: yenānyābhāsyatvena hetunā sūryādayastasminbrahmaṇi viṣaye bhāsakāḥ syustathā tu brahmānyena nopalabhyate svaprakāśatvāditi yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4474: yo 'ṅguṣṭhamātro jīvaḥ sa vastuto nirdhūmajyotirvannirmalaprakāśarūpa iti tamarthaṃ saṃśodhya tasya brahmatvamāha-īśāna iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4479_1: dhyāyediti vidhyadhyāhareṇa dhyānaparaṃ vākyamiti pūrvapakṣayati-tatra parimāṇeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4480: pūrvapakṣe brahmadṛṣṭyā jīvopāstiḥ, siddhānte tu pratyagbrahmaikyajñānaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4489: bhūtabhavyasvetyupapadādbādhakābhāvācca īśāna itīśatvaśabdānniraṅkuśamīśitā bhātīti śrutyā liṅgaṃ bādhyāmiti siddhāntayati-paramātmaiveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4496: mukhyāṅguṣṭhamātro jīvo gṛhyatāṃ kiṃ gauṇagrahaṇenetyata āha-na cānya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4498: atra tu śrutivirodhādasaṃbhava iti gauṇagraha ityartha /
GSP33brsgor1u:4505: arthitvādityanena niṣkāmānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ cādhikāro vāritaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4506: tatra mumukṣūṇāṃ śudyarthitve nityādiṣvadhikāro na kāmyeṣu /
GSP33brsgor1u:4507: śuddhacittānāṃ mokṣārthitve śravaṇādiṣu vyañjakeṣvadhikāro na karmasviti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4513: 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādiśāstrasyāviśeṣaṇa sarvānphalārthinaḥ prati pravṛttatvāt, prāṇimātrasya sukhārthitvācca phalārthe karmaṇi paśvādīnāmapyadhikāra ityāśaṅkyoktarityāteṣāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4514: śaktatvādyabhāvātsvargakāmapadaṃ manuṣyaparatayā saṃkocya manuṣyādhikāratve sthāpite caturvarṇyādhikāritvamāśaṅkya 'vasante brāhmaṇo
GSP33brsgor1u:4520: saṃprati tacchabdenāṅguṣṭhamātraṃ jīvamanūdyāyamīśāna iti brahmābhedo bodhya iti vaktumanuvadati-yadapīti
GSP33brsgor1u:4527: dvividhetyādibhāṣyāttu jīvamuddiśya brahmatvabodhanamiti pratīyata iti sūtrārthāsparśitvādbhāṣyamanupapannamiti cet, na,
GSP33brsgor1u:4530: tatrāvāntaratātparyamupāsye brahmaṇi, mahātātparyaṃ ca jñeye brahmaṇi /
GSP33brsgor1u:4532: ata evopāsanāphalaṃ kaṭhavallyāmeva-'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya
GSP33brsgor1u:4534: ata eva caturthādhyāye dvitīyacaraṇe 'tadokaḥ'iti sūtre hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti iti bhāṣyakāraiḥ prathamavākyasya upāsye brahmaṇi tātparyamiti prakaṭīkṛtam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4539: taṃ jīvaṃ pravṛhetpṛthakkuryāt, dhairyeṇa balavadindriyanigrahādinā, taṃ viviktamātmānaṃ śuklaṃ svaprakāśamamṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahma jānīyādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4548: atra manuṣyādhikāratvoktyā smṛtānāṃ devādināṃ vedāntaśravaṇādāvadhikāro 'sti na veti saṃdehe bhogāsaktānāṃ vairāgyādyasaṃbhavānneti prāpte
GSP33brsgor1u:4551: atra pūrvapakṣe devādināṃ jñānānadhikārāddevatvaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalāsu daharādyupāsanāsu kramamuktyarthināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapravṛttiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tu pravṛttiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4552: upāsanābhirdevatvaṃ prāptānāṃ śravaṇādinā jñānānmuktisaṃbhavāditi saphalo 'yaṃ vicāraḥ nanu bhogāsaktānāṃ teṣāṃ mokṣārthitvābhāvānnādhikāra ityata
GSP33brsgor1u:4554: vikāratvenānṛtaviṣayasukhasya kṣayāsūyādidoṣaddaṣṭyā niratiśayasukhamokṣārthitvaṃ sattvaprakṛtīnāṃ devānāṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4555: nanvindrāya svāhetyādau caturthyantaśabdātiriktā vigrahavatī devatā nāsti,
GSP33brsgor1u:4560: nanu vigrahavattvena dṛṣṭasāmarthye satyapyupanayanābhāvācchāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāstītyata āha-na ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4561: janmāntarādhyayanabalātsvayameva pratibhātāḥ smṛtā vedā yeṣāṃ te tathā tadbhāvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4562: bālādiṣu praviṣṭapiśācādīnāṃ vedodghoṣadarśanāddevayonīnāṃ janmāntarasmaraṇamastīti smṛtavedāntānāmarthavicāro yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4563: devānāmṛṣīṇāṃ ca vidyādhikāre kāraṇamarthitvādikamuktvā śrautaṃ gurukulavāsādiliṅgamāha-apiceti
GSP33brsgor1u:4572: 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇām'itivākyabādho 'pyanumānasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4575: ataḥ śrutiṣu teṣāṃ nādhikāra ityata āha-devādyadhikāre 'pīti //26//
GSP33brsgor1u:4579_0: nanu mantrādīnāṃ pratīyamānavigrahavattve tātparyaṃ kalpayitvā devādīnāmadhikāra uktaḥ, sa cāyuktaḥ, anyaparāṇāṃ teṣāṃ pratyakṣādivirodhena
GSP33brsgor1u:4583: abhyupagame pratyakṣeṇa devatā dṛśyeta, naca dṛśyate, ato yogyānupalabdhyā devatāyā vigrahavatyā abhāvātsaṃpradānakārakābhāvena karmaniṣpattirna
GSP33brsgor1u:4585: vigrahasyāṅgatvamupalabdhibādhitaṃ yuktyā ca na saṃbhavatītyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4586: tasmādarthopahitaśabda eva devatā, tasyā acetanatvānna vidyādhikāra iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4589: ato na karmaṇi virodha iti vyācaṣṭe-kasmādityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4590: vaiśvadevaśastre śasyamānadevāḥ katīti śākalyena pṛṣṭo yājñavalkyo nividā
GSP33brsgor1u:4593: ṣaḍadhikāni trīṇi śatāni trīṇi sahasrāṇīti saṃkhyoktau
GSP33brsgor1u:4594: saṃkhyeyasvarūpapraśne, mahimāno vibhūtayaḥ sarve devā eṣāṃ trayastriṃśaddevānāmato 'ṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraḥ prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśadevāste 'pi
GSP33brsgor1u:4596: ṣaṭ devāstriṣu lokeṣu trayaśca dvayorannaprāṇayordvai ca ekasminprāṇe hiraṇyagarbhe 'ntarbhavata iti darśitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4598: darśanaṃ śrautaṃ vyākhyāya smārtaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tathā smṛtiriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4612: tasya loke darśanāditi vaktuṃ vyatirekamāha-kvacideka iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4616: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām |
GSP33brsgor1u:4620: autpattikasūtre śabdārthayoranādyoḥ saṃbandhasyānāditvādvedasya svārthe mānāntarānapekṣatvena prāmāṇyamuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4621_0: idānīmanityavigrahavyaktyabhyupagame tatsaṃbandhasyāpyanityatvānmānāntareṇa vyaktiṃ jñātvā śabdasya saṃketaḥ puṃsā kartavya
GSP33brsgor1u:4621_1: iti mānāntarāpekṣatvātprāmāṇyasya virodhaḥ syādityāha-kathamityādinā kiṃ śabdānāmanityatayā saṃbandhasya kāryatvamāpadyate,
GSP33brsgor1u:4627: śabdasya nimittatvena brahmasahakāritvādavirodha ityāśaṅkya dvitīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati-apiceti
GSP33brsgor1u:4632: nityaḥ syāditi vācyaṃ, ubhayāśritasaṃbandhasyānyatarābhāve sthityayogena dṛṣṭāntāsidveriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4633: yathā gotvādayo gavādiśabdavācyāstathā vasutvādyākṛtayo vasvādiśabdārthā na vyaktya iti pariharati-netyādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:4634: śabdānāṃ tadarthānāṃ jātīnāṃ ca nityatvāttatsaṃbandho 'pi nitya iti pratipādayati-nahītyādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:4636: naca gotvāvacchedena vyaktiṣu śaktiḥ sugraheti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4637: sāmānyasyāpratyāsattitvena sarvavyaktyupasthityabhāvāt, gotvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakamiti grahāpekṣayā gotvaṃ śakyamiti lāghavāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:4639: yadvā kevala vyaktiṣu śaktiratra nirasyate, anupapattijñānaṃ, vinaiva vyakteḥ śabdaśaktyāyattajātijñānaviṣayatvenobhayaśakterāvaśyakatvāt
GSP33brsgor1u:4642: ata eva vākyavṛttau tattvamasyādivākye bhāgalakṣaṇoktā yujyate,
GSP33brsgor1u:4645_0: kevalavyaktivacanāḥ khalu ḍitthādiśabdā arthānantarabhāvinaḥ sāṃketikāḥ gavādiśabdāstu vyaktiprabhavahetutvena prāgevasandhīti
GSP33brsgor1u:4645_1: na vyaktimātravacanāḥ sāṃketikāḥ kintu sthūlasūkṣmabhāvenānusyūtavyaktyavinābhūtasāmānyavacanā iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4649: nanu kā sā vyaktiḥ, yadanugatendratvādijātiḥ śabdārthaḥ syādityata
GSP33brsgor1u:4662: asṛgrudhiraṃ tatpradhāne dehe ramanta iti asṛgrā manuṣyāḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4664: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntastiraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥ pavitraśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4669: sa prajāpatirmanasā vācaṃ trayīṃ mithunaṃ samabhavat manovāgrūpaṃ mithunaṃ saṃbhāvitavān /
GSP33brsgor1u:4674: yā prajāpatisṛṣṭiḥ sā śabdapūrvikā, sṛṣṭitvāt, pratyakṣaghaṭādivaditi
GSP33brsgor1u:4678: tatra varṇānāmanityatvātsphoṭasya cāsattvānna jagaddhetutvamityākṣepe dvitīyapakṣaṃ vaiyākaraṇo gṛhṇāti-sphoṭamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4679: sphuṭyate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭovarṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4683: tāratvamandratvādiviruddhadharmavattvena tāro gakāro mandro gakāra iti pratīyamānagakārasya bhedānumānātpratyabhijñāgatvajātiviṣayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4684: nanu viruddhadharmajñānaṃ dhvanyupādhikaṃ bhrama ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4685: tathāca varṇānāmanityatvānna jagaddhetutvamiti bhāvaḥ kiñca teṣāmarthabodhakatvāyogātsphoṭo 'ṅgīkārya ityāha-naca varṇebhya ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4688: tarhi varṇānāṃ samudāyo bodhaka ityāśaṅkya kṣaṇikānāṃ sa nāstītyāha-naceti
GSP33brsgor1u:4689: varṇānāṃ svataḥ sāhityābhāve 'pi saṃskāralakṣaṇāpūrvadvārā sāhityamāgneyādiyāgānāmiveti śaṅkate-pūrveti
GSP33brsgor1u:4690: kimayaṃ saṃskāro varṇairjanito 'pūrvākhyaḥ kaścit, uta varṇānubhavajanito bhāvanākhyaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4696: dvitīye kiṃ pratyakṣeṇa jñāta uta kāryaliṅgena /
GSP33brsgor1u:4699: kāryamarthadhīstasyāṃ jātāyāṃ saṃskārapratyayaḥ tasmiñjāte seti parasparāśrayeṇa dūṣayati-neti
GSP33brsgor1u:4700: padārthasmaraṇasyāpi padajñānāntarabhāvitvāttena saṃskārasahitāntyavarṇātmakapadasya jñānaṃ na yuktamityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4704: na cāntyavarṇasāhityādarthadhīhetutvaṃ, kevalasaṃskārasya tu varṇasmṛtihetutvamiti vācyaṃ, arthadhīpūrvakāle bhāvanāyā jñānābhāvenārthadhīhetutvāyogāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4710_0: yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo gakāradyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4710_1: saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte tasmin antyavarṇakṛtapratyayena janitaḥ paripāko 'ntyaḥ saṃskāroyasmiṃstasminpratyayini citte
GSP33brsgor1u:4710_2: ekaṃ gauritipadamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4714: nanvekapadamekaṃ vākyamiti pratyayaḥ padavākyasphoṭayorna pramāṇaṃ, tasya varṇasamūhālambanasmṛtitvādityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-na ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4716: nanu tadevedaṃ padamiti pratyabhijñā bhramaḥ, udāttādibhedapratyayādityata
GSP33brsgor1u:4721: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktaṃ, bhedadhīvirodhāt
GSP33brsgor1u:4722: sa evāyaṃ varṇa iti dhīstu pramaiva, bādhakābhāvādityāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4726: yattvayā pītaṃ jalaṃ tadeva mayā pītamityādau /
GSP33brsgor1u:4727: na tatheha vyaktibhedaḥ siddha iti pariharati-na /
GSP33brsgor1u:4736_0: anantā gakārādivyaktayastāsu pratyabhijñānārthaṃ gatvādijātayastāsu codāttatvādibhedasyaupādhikatvamiti kalpanādvaraṃ varṇavyaktibhedamātrasyaupādhikatvakalpanamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:4736_1: vyaktyānantyasya jātīnāṃ ca kalpanamayuktamityarthaḥ nanu bhedasya bādhakābhāvānnaupādhikatvamityata āha-eṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4737: astu tarhi pratyayadvayaprāmāṇyāya bhedābhedayoḥ satyatvaṃ, tatrāha-kathaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4740: nanu vāyusaṃyogāderatīndriyatvānna tadgatavaicitryasyodāttatvādervarṇeṣu pratyakṣāropaḥ saṃbhavatītyaruciṃ vadiṣyansvamatamāha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4749: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4750: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣvavyakteṣu dhvanibuddhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:4751: dundubhyādidhvanau śabdatvamātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayamavyakto varṇa iti dhīḥ syāditi mantavyam
GSP33brsgor1u:4752: evaṃ dhvanyupādhikatve svamate guṇaṃ vadanvāyūpādhikatve pūrvoktāmaruciṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4757: evaṃ viruddhadharmakadhvanīnāṃ bhede 'pi na teṣvanugatā varṇā bhidyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4759: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4762: yadvā udāttatvādibhedaviśiṣṭatayā pratyabhijñāyamānatvādvarṇānāṃ bheda ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4763: varṇānāṃ sthāyitvaṃ prasādhya teṣāmeva vācakatvaṃ vaktuṃ sphoṭaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4766: cakṣuṣā darpaṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau mukhavacchrotreṇa varṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau vinaiva hetvantaraṃ sphoṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityāha-jhaṭitīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4767: yasyāṃ saṃvidi yor'tho bhāsate sā tatra pramāṇam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4768: ekapadamiti buddhau varṇā eva sphuranti nātiriktasphoṭa iti na sā sphoṭe
GSP33brsgor1u:4771: nanu gopadabuddheḥ sphoṭo viṣayo gakārādīnāṃ tu vyañjakatvādanuvṛttirityata āha--yadi hīti
GSP33brsgor1u:4776: nanu tatraikadeśādirūpādhirasti, prakṛte ka upādhirityata āha--yā tviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4777: ekārthe śaktamekaṃ padaṃ, pradhānārtha ekasmin tātparyavadekaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4779: na caikapadatve jñāte ekārthajñānaṃ, asmiñjñāte tadityanyonyāśraya iti
GSP33brsgor1u:4785: nanu nityavibhūnāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ kramaḥ kathaṃ vā
GSP33brsgor1u:4787_1: iti gṛhītāḥ santaḥ śrotuḥ pravṛttikāle tathaiva smṛtyārūḍhāḥ svasvārthaṃ bodhayantītyarthaḥ sthāyivarṇavādamupasaṃharati-varṇeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4791: sthirāṇi gatyādisāmānyāni kramaviśeṣavanti gṛhītasaṃgatikānyarthabodhakānīti kḷpteṣu sāmānyeṣu prakriyā saṃcārayitavyā na tvakḷptaḥ sphoṭaḥ kalpanīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4797: pūrvatantrasiddhameva vedasya nityatvaṃ devādivyaktisṛṣṭau tadvācakaśabdasyāpi sṛṣṭerasiddhamityāśaṅkya nityākṛtivācakācchabdādvyaktijanmoktyā sāṃketikatvaṃ nirasya vedo
GSP33brsgor1u:4799: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena vāco vedasya lābhayogyatāṃ prāptāḥ santo yājñikāstāmṛṣiṣu sthitāṃ labdhavanta iti mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4808: vyavahārāvicchedājjñāyate ceti vedasyānapekṣatvena prāmāṇye na kaścidvirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4809_0: nirlepalaye tu saṃbandhanāśāt punaḥ sṛṣṭau kenacitpuṃsā saṃketaḥ kartavya iti puruṣabuddhisāpekṣatvena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4811: tathāca saṃskārātmanā śabdārthatatsaṃbandhānāṃ satāmeva punaḥ sṛṣṭāvabhivyakternānityatvam
GSP33brsgor1u:4813: viṣamasṛṣṭau hi saṃketāpekṣā na tulyasṛṣṭāviti pariharati-tatredamityādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:4816: nanvastvanādisaṃsāre saṃbandhasyānāditvaṃ tathāpi mahāpralayavyavadhānādasmaraṇe kathaṃ vedārthavyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4820: atha tadā suṣuptau prāṇe paramātmani jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4824: svapnavatkalpitasyājñātasattvābhāvāt darśanaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ adarśanaṃ laya iti dṛṣṭisṛṣṭipakṣaḥ śrutyabhipreta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4829: iti yadyapi tathāpi na prākṛtavaditi yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4830: jñānādernikarṣavadutkarṣo 'pyaṅgīkāryaḥ, bādhābhāvāditi nyāyānugṛhītaśrutyādibhiḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaṃ bādhyamityāha-yathā
GSP33brsgor1u:4837_0: pūrvaṃ kalpādau sṛjati tasmai brahmaṇe prahiṇoti gamayati tasya buddhau vedānāvirbhāvayati yastaṃ devaṃ svātmākāraṃ mahāvākyotthabuddhau
GSP33brsgor1u:4837_1: prakāśamānaṃ śaraṇaṃ paramamabhayasthānaṃ niḥśreyasarūpamahaṃ prapadya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4838: na kevalamekasyaiva jñānātiśayaḥ kintu bahūnāṃ śākhādraṣṭṛṇāmiti
GSP33brsgor1u:4844: ārṣeya ṛṣiyogaḥ, chando gāyatryādi, daivatamagnyādi, brāhmaṇaṃ viniyogaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4847: tathāca jñānādhikaiḥ kalpāntaritaṃ vedaṃ smṛtvā vyavahārasya pravartitatvādvedasyānāditvamanapekṣatvaṃ cāvirūddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4850: aihikāmuṣmikaviṣayasukharāgakṛtarmasya phalaṃ paśvādikaṃ dṛṣṭapaśvādisadṛśyamiti yuktaṃ, visadṛśe kāmābhāvena hetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4857: karmaṇi vihitaniṣiddhatvākāreṇāpūrvaṃ, kriyātvena saṃskāraṃ ca janayanti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4862: sa eva svabhāvaḥ prakṛtirvāsaneti ca gīyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:4863: evaṃ karmaṇāṃ sṛṣṭisādṛśyamuktvā svopādāne līnakāryasaṃskārarūpaśaktibalādapi sādṛśyamāha-pralīyamānamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:4866: avidyāyāṃ līnakāryātmakasaṃskārādanyāḥ śaktayo na kalpyāḥ manābhāvādrauravācca /
GSP33brsgor1u:4872: yathā suptotthitasya pūrvacakṣurjātīyameva cakṣurjāyate tacca pūrvarūpajātīyameva rūpaṃ gṛhṇāti na rasādikaṃ, evaṃ bhogya lokā
GSP33brsgor1u:4873: bhogāśrayāḥ prāṇinikāyā bhogahetukarmāṇi saṃskārabalātpūrvalokāditulyānyeveti niyama ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4882: bhāvidṛṣṭyā yajamāno 'gniḥ annādo 'ragnirahaṃ syāmiti kāmayitvā kṛttikānakṣatrābhimānidevāyāgnaye aṣṭasu kapāleṣu pacanīyaṃ havirniruptavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4886: evaṃ 'rudro vā akāmayata''viṣṇurvā akāmayata'ityatrāpi tathā vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4903: dyulokākhyavaṃśadaṇḍe antarikṣarūpe madhvapūpe sthita ādityo devānāṃ modanānmadhviva madhvityāropya dhyānaṃ kāryam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4905: astu vasvādīnāṃ tatrādhikāra ityāśaṅkya teṣāmapi tatra dhyeyatvātprāpyatvācca na dhyātṛtvamityāha-punaśceti
GSP33brsgor1u:4906_0: caturvedoktakarmāṇi praṇavaśceti pañca kusumāni, tebhyaḥ somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaparaḥ kṛṣṇagopyākhyāni
GSP33brsgor1u:4906_2: yaśastejaindriyavīryānnātmanā pariṇatāni pañcadikṣu sthitairvasvādibhirūpajīvyānīti dhyāyato vasvādiprāptiruktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4908: ākāśabrahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādāḥ, dvau karṇau, dve netre, dve nāsike, ekā vāgiti saptasvindriyeṣu śiraścamasatīrastheṣu saptarṣidhyānaṃ kāryamityāha-tathemāveveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4909: atha dakṣiṇaḥ karṇaḥ gautamaḥ, vāmo bhāradvājaḥ, evaṃ dakṣiṇanetranāsike viśvāmitravasiṣṭhau, vāme jamadagnikaśyapau, vāgatrirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4914: kiñca vigrahābhāvāddevādīnāṃ na kvāpyadhikāra ityāha-jyotiṣi bhāvācceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4915: ādityaḥ sūryaścandraḥ śukro 'ṅgāraka ityādiśabdānāṃ jyotiḥpiṇḍeṣu prayogasya bhāvātsattvānna vigrahavāndevaḥ kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4926: loke 'pi yamaṃ daṇḍahastaṃ likhanti, indraṃ vajrahastamiti vigrahādipañcakasadbhāvādhanadhikāradoṣo nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4927: vigraho haviṣāṃ bhoga aiśvaryaṃ ca prasannatā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4933: vrīhyādivadprayogavidhigṛhītā mantrāḥ prayogasaṃbanddhābhidhānārthā nājñātavigrahādiparā iti mīmāṃsakā ācakṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4939: brahmavidyā devādīnnādhikaroti, vidyātvāt, madhvādividyāvaditi uktaheturaprayojaka ityāha-yadyapīti
GSP33brsgor1u:4940: darśādikaṃ, na brāhmaṇamadhikaroti, karmatvāt, rājasūyādivaditi ābhāsasāmyaṃ vidyātvahetorāha-naceti
GSP33brsgor1u:4941: yatra yasyādhikāraḥ saṃbhavati sa tatrādhikārīti nyāyastulya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4942: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetatyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4943: tadbrahma yo yo devādīnāṃ madhye pratyaktvenābudhyata sa tadbrahmābhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4944: te ha devā ūcuranyonyaṃ, tata indravirocanau surāsurarājau prajāpatiṃ brahmavidyāpradaṃ jagmaturiti ca liṅgamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4945: kimatra brahmāmṛtamiti gandharvapraśne yājñavalkya uvāca tamiti mokṣadharmeṣu śrutaṃ devādīnāmadhikāraliṅgamityāha-smārtamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:4947: śāstrajñairgolakātiriktendriyāṇi svīkriyante, yathā jyotirādau sūryādiśabdaprayoge 'pi vigrahavaddevatā svīkāryā ityāha-jyotirādīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4954: muniṃ meṣo bhūtvā jahāreti jñāpanārthaṃ meṣa, itīndrasaṃbodhanamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4957: ādityādau ko jaḍabhāgaḥ kaścetanāṃśa iti, tatrāha-jyotirādestviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4958: mantrādikaṃ padaśaktyā bhāsamānavigrahādau svārthe na pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4960: anyaparādapi vākyādbādhābhāve svārtho grāhya ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4962: tṛṇādau pratyayo 'sti vigrahādau sa nāstīti vaiṣamyaṃ śaṅkate-atrāheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4970_0: nañpadamekaṃ yadā surāṃ pibediti padābhyāmanveti tadā padaikavākyamekamevārthānubhavaṃ karoti natu padadvayaṃ pṛthaksurāpānaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4971: arthavādastu bhūtārthasaṃsargaṃ stutidvāraṃ bodhayanvidhinā vākyaikavākyatāṃ bhajata ityasti vigrahādyanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4977: yatra 'vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ'ityādau mānāntarasaṃvādavisaṃvādau na stastatra bhūtārthavāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4982: na cobhyaparatve vākyabhedaḥ, avāntarārthasya mahāvākyārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:4984: nanu kleśātmake karmaṇi vidhiḥ phalaṃ vinānupapanna iti bhavatu 'yanna
GSP33brsgor1u:4986: vigrahaṃ vinā vidheḥ kānupapattiḥ, tāmāha-na hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4987: uddiśya tyāgānupapattyā cetasyāroho 'ṅgīkārya ityatra śrutimapyāha-yasyā iti /

GSP33brsgor1u:5445: hantedānīṃ brahma vakṣyāmīti brahmavākyena jīvapraśnādvyavahitanamapi 'yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya'ityādi vākyaṃ jīvaviṣayamuttaraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5447: vākyārthastu ātmā maraṇaṃ prāpya yathā bhavati tathā vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5452: evaṃ ca trayāṇāmevopanyāsaḥ praśnaśca yataḥ ato na pradhānamavyaktamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5454: ekaḥ praśnaḥ dvau praśnau veti pakṣadvaye phalitaṃ pṛcchati-kiñcāta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5457: praśnaikye sūtrāsaṃgatiḥ bhede pradhānasya śrautatvasiddhiriti pūrvavādyāha-sa evetyādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:5464: itaḥ punaḥ martyalokaṃ prāptasya mama pitā yathāpūrvaṃ sumanāḥ syāditi prathamaṃ vavre /
GSP33brsgor1u:5465: nanu dvitīyavaro jīvavidyā tṛtīyo brahmavidyeti praśnabhedaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-yeyamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:5466: prete ityupakramya tṛtīyatvoktiliṅgājjīvātmavidyaiva tṛtīyo vara ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5467: evaṃ vākyopakrame sati praśnāntaraṃ na yuktamityāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5468: maraṇadharmādyasparśaliṅgābhyāṃ praṣṭavyayorjīveśvarayorbhedāt praśnabhedasiddhervākyabādho yukta iti śaṅkate-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5470: na kevalaṃ praṣṭavyabhedāt praśnabhedaḥ kintu praśnavākyayoḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5473: kiñca brahmāpraśne janmādiniṣedhena jīvasvarūpaṃ vadan yamastayoraikyaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5481: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tāmātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5483: kiñcābhedamuktvā bhedasya ninditatvādabheda eva satya ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5485: evamihākhaṇḍaikarase brahmaṇi yo nāneva mithyābhedaṃ paśyati sa bhedadarśī maraṇānmaraṇaṃ prāpnoti saṃsārabhayānna mucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5486: kiñca jīvapraśnānantaraṃ 'taṃ durdarśam'iti yaduttaramuvāca tenāpyuttareṇābhedo gamyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5492: bhogāpavargamārgayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ pratijñāya 'dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā'iti darśitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5493: preyaḥ priyatamaṃ svargādikaṃ, viṣūcī viruddhaphale, avidyā karma, vidyā tattvadhīḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5494: vidyābhīpsinaṃ vidyārthinaṃ tvāmahaṃ manye, yataḥ tvā tvāṃ bahavo 'pi
GSP33brsgor1u:5495: kāmāḥ putrādayo mayā dīyamānā durlabhā api nālolupanta lobhavantaṃ na kṛtavanta iti praṣṭāraṃ stutvā praśnamapi 'tvādṛṅgo bhūyānnaciketaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5497: iyaṃ praśaṃsā praśnabhedapakṣe na ghaṭata ityāha-yatpraśneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5498: yatpraśnena stutiṃ labdhavāṃstaṃ praśnaṃ vihāya yadyanyamevotthāpayet tarhyanavasare stutīḥ kṛtā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5504: avidyānāśānantaraṃ brahmatvaṃ cedāgantukamanityaṃ ca syādityata āha-na
GSP33brsgor1u:5506: jīvasya brahmatve svābhāvike sati brahmapraśnasya yaduttaraṃ tajjīvapraśnasyāpi bhavatīti lābhaṃ darśayati-tataśca na jāyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5516: na cākāśādiśabde vyabhicāraḥ, ākāśādermatāntarasādhāraṇatvena sāṃkhyāsādhāraṇatvāsiddheḥ sādhyasyāpi sattvāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5520: ātmā mahānityātmaśabdaprayogāt, taṃ matvā na śocati, 'tamasaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5528: atrājāpadaṃ viṣayaḥ, tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ māyāparaṃ veti rūḍhyarthāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvatrāvyaktaśabdamātreṇa
GSP33brsgor1u:5531: phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe brahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti pūrvavaddraṣṭavyam
GSP33brsgor1u:5534: avayavāḥ pradhānasya rajādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayaḥ tairnimittairlohitādiśabdaiḥ pradhānamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5548: māyādāvapi sādhāraṇānmantrādviśeṣārthagraho na yuktaḥ, viśeṣagrahahetoḥ prakaraṇāderabhāvāditi hetuṃ vyākhyāya dṛṣṭāntaṃ vyācaṣṭe-camasavaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:5552: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke |
GSP33brsgor1u:5560: kiñca lohitādiśabdairapi dravyalakṣaṇā nyāyyā avyavadhānāt na tu rañjanīyatvādiguṇavyavahitā sattvādiguṇalakṣaṇetyāha-lohitādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5561: nanu śākhāntareṇa śākhāntarasthamantrasya nirṇayaḥ kathamityata āha-asaṃdigdheneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5563: yathā śākhāntaravākyānna pradhānagrahastathehāpi śvetāśvataropaniṣadi māyāprakaraṇānna tadbrahma ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5565_0: brahmavādino dhyānākhyayogena paramātmānamanupraviṣṭāḥ santaḥ tatraiva devasyātmabhūtāmaikyenādhyastāṃ śaktiṃ paratantrāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5566: māyāyā ekatve 'pi tadaṃśānāṃ jīvopādhīnāṃ tattasaṃghātayonīnāmavidyākhyānāṃ bhedādvīpsā
GSP33brsgor1u:5578: kiṃ tejobannetvajāśabdo rūḍho, na jāyata iti yaugiko vā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5592: naca yogasya mukhyavṛttitvāttena pradhānagraho nyāyya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5595_0: tathāca rohitādiśabdasamabhivyāhārānugṛhītayā rūḍhyāśritayā guṇavṛttyā pradhāne yogaṃ bādhitvāvāntaraprakṛtirajāśabdena grāhya,
GSP33brsgor1u:5595_1: yathā madhvādiśabdaiḥ prasiddhamadhvādyāśritaguṇalakṣaṇaya ādityādayo gṛhyante tadvat /
GSP33brsgor1u:5601_0: pañcajanaśabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaparo 'nyaparo veti yogarūḍhyoraniścayāt saṃśaye yathā tattvavidyādhikāre chāgāyāṃ tātparyābhāvādajāpade
GSP33brsgor1u:5601_1: rūḍhityāgastathā pañcamanuṣyeṣu tātparyābhāvātpañcajanaśabdena rūḍhiṃ tyaktvā tattvāni grāhyāṇītidṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiṃ sūcayan
GSP33brsgor1u:5605: tatra catvāraḥ sūtraṃ annaṃ virāṭ tayoḥ kāraṇamavyākṛtamākāśaśca yasminnadhyastāstamevātmānamamṛtaṃ brahma manye /
GSP33brsgor1u:5607_0: nanvastu pañcatvaśiṣṭeṣu pañcajaneṣu punaḥ pañcatvānvayāt pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītiḥ, tāvatā kathaṃ sāṃkhyatattvagraha ityāśaṅkya
GSP33brsgor1u:5607_1: saṃkhyāyā dharmyākāṅkṣāyāṃ tattvāni grāhyāṇītyāha-tatheti jagato mūlabhūtā prakṛtistriguṇātmakaṃ pradhānamanāditvādavikṛtiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5611: ahaṅkārastāmasaḥ pañcatanmātrāṇāṃ śabdādīnāṃ prakṛtiḥ, sāttvika ekādaśendriyāṇām /
GSP33brsgor1u:5612: pañca tanmātrāśca pañcānāṃ sthūlabhūtānāmākāśādīnāṃ prakṛtayaḥ pañca sthūlabhūtānyekādaśendriyāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāko gaṇo vikāra eva na
GSP33brsgor1u:5620_0: yadyapi jñānakarmendriyeṣu daśasu jñānakaraṇatvaṃ karmakaraṇatvaṃ ca pañcakadvaye 'sti, pañcatanmātrāsu pañcasu sthūlaprakṛtitvaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5620_1: ca, tathāpi yasminnityātmana ākāśasya ca pṛthagukteḥ sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5621: pañca kartavyāḥ, manaścatvāri bhūtāni ca pañca /
GSP33brsgor1u:5630: pañcaśabdadvayena svavācyanyūnasaṃkhyādvāreṇa tadvyāpyā mahāsaṃkhyaiva lakṣyata iti sadṛṣṭāntaṃ śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5631: mukhyārthasya vakṣyamāṇatvāllakṣaṇā na yukteti pariharati-tadapi neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5638: tathāca na dvitīyapañcaśabdajanaśabdayoḥ samāsaṃ vināntyasyākārasyodāttatvaṃ pūrveṣāmanudāttatatvaṃ ca ghaṭate 'samāsasya'iti sūtreṇa samāsasyāntodāttavidhānāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5639: 'anudāttaṃ padamekavarjam'iti ca sūtreṇa yasminpade udāttaḥ svarito vā
GSP33brsgor1u:5640_0: yasya varṇasya vidhīyate tamekaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭaṃ tatpadamanudāttaṃ bhavatīti vidhānādeva māntrikāntodāttasvareṇaikapadatvaniścayaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5641: vā'iti sūtreṇa yo mantradaśāyāmanudāttaḥ svarito vā sa
GSP33brsgor1u:5645: tathā cāntyanakārāduparitana ākāra ākāśaścetyanena śliṣṭatayā paṭhyamāno
GSP33brsgor1u:5646: 'nudātto bhavati, ayamantānudāttasvaraḥ pāribhāṣikastena brāhmaṇasvareṇaikapadatvaṃ niścīyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5649: antānudāttaṃ hi samāmnātāraḥ pañcajanaśabdamadhīyata iti pāṭhakaprasiddhirasiddheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5650: tathā ca pañca pañcajanā iti māntrikāntodāttaḥ svaraḥ, yasmin pañca pañcajanā ityantānudātto brāhnasvara iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5653: ājya, tvā tvāṃ pañcānāṃ pañcajanānāṃ devaviśeṣāṇāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi ityājyagrahaṇamantraśeṣaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5654: devatānāṃ karmaṇi yantradavasthitaṃ śarīraṃ tadeva dhartraṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5658: janapañcakamekaṃ pañcakānāṃ pañcakaṃ dvitīyamiti pañcakadvayaṃ tasya pañcapañceti grahaṇaṃ netyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5660: parasparānvayaḥ, kiṃ vā tayoḥ śuddhajanairanvayaḥ, athavā pañcatvaviśiṣṭairjanairaparapañcatvasyānvayaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5671: pañcānāṃ pūlānāṃ samāhārā ityatra 'saṃkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ'iti samāso vihitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5672: tato 'dvigoḥ'iti sūtreṇa ṅīpo vidhānāt samāhārapratītau samāhārāḥ katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcetipadāntarānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5673: pañcajanā ityatra tu ṅībantatvābhāvena samāhārasyāpratīteḥ janānāṃ cādita eva pañcatvopādānātsaṃkhyākāṅkṣāyā asattvātpañceti padāntaraṃ nānveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5676: nanu janānāṃ nirākāṅkṣatve 'pi tadviśeṣaṇībhūtapañcatvāni katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañcatvāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatvityāśaṅkate-bhavadapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5677: nopasarjanasyopasarjanāntareṇānvayaḥ kintu pradhānenaiveti nopasarjanyāyavirodha ukta iti pariharati-tatra ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5685: naca sattvarajastamasāṃ pṛthaggaṇanayā seṣṭeti vācyam, ākāśasya
GSP33brsgor1u:5689: kiṃ ca pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītāvapi na sāṃkhyatattvānāṃ grahaṇamityāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5694: pañca ca te janāśceti karmadhārayādisamāsāntarātsaṃjñāsamāsasyāptoktyā balavattvaṃ tāvadāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5695: vigvācinaḥ saṃkhyāvācinaśca śabdāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ subantetottarapadena samasyante
GSP33brsgor1u:5704: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5705: pañcajanaśabdasya prāṇādiṣu kayā vṛttyā prayoga iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5707: yathā tava tattveṣu janaśabdasya lakṣaṇaya prayogastathā mama prāṇādiṣu pañcajanaśabdasya lakṣaṇayetyāha-tattveṣviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5715: nanu jāyanta iti janā mahadādayaḥ, janakatvājjanaḥ pradhānamiti yogasaṃbhave kimiti rūḍhimāśritya lakṣaṇāprayāsa ityata āha-samāseti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5716: yathā aśvakarṇaśabdasya varṇasamudāyasya vṛkṣe rūḍhirevaṃ pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhireva nāvayavaśaktyātmako yoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5720: janasaṃbandhācceti pūrvabhāṣye nareṣu pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhimāśritya prāṇādiṣu lakṣaṇoktā
GSP33brsgor1u:5721: iha tu prauḍhivādena prāṇādiṣu rūḍhirucyata iti mantavyam /

GSP33brsgor1u:5725_1: paśūnsādhayatīti prasiddheravirodhādaperakṛtajyotiṣṭome guṇavidhyayogāt, tadvidhau codbhidākhyaguṇavatā yāgeneti matvarthasaṃbandhalakṣaṇāprasaṅgācceti

GSP33brsgor1u:5738: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ jyotistadbrahma devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5740: tatkāṇvānāṃ pañacatvapūraṇāya gṛhyate nānyeṣāmiti vikalpo na yukta iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti
GSP33brsgor1u:5742: yathā atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti iti vākyabhedādvikalpastadvacchākhābhedenānnapāṭhāpāṭhābhyāṃ jyotiṣo vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5743: nanu kriyāyāṃ vikalpo yukto na vastunīti cet /
