GSP33brsgor1u:5753_0: adhikaraṇatrayeṇa pradhānasyāśrautatvoktyā jagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇena brahmaṇa eva buddhisthatā, tasminneva buddhisthe nirviśeṣe
GSP33brsgor1u:5753_1: brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti sādhitaṃ pūrvasūtrasaṃdarbheṇa tatra lakṣaṇasamanvayayorasiddhireva, śrutīnāṃ virodhadarśanādityākṣeparūpāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5754: na cāvirodhacintāyā dvitīyādhyāye saṃgatirnāsminnadhyāya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5756: tatpadavācyajagatkāraṇavādiśrutīnāṃ mitho virodhādvācyārthānirṇayena lakṣye samanvayāsiddhau prāptāyāṃ tatsādhakāvirodhacintāyā atraiva saṃgatatvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5757: na caivaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmapyavirodho 'traiva cintanīya iti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor1u:5759: kimarthaṃ tarhi dvitīye taccintanaṃ, sthūlabuddhisamādhānārthamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5760: iha tu sūkṣmadṛśāṃ vākyārthe samanvayajñānāya tatpadārthaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5761: tadyapi tvaṃpadārthaśrutivirodho 'tra parihartavyaḥ tathāpi prathamasūtreṇa bandhamithyātvasūcanādavirodhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5764: tāḥ kiṃ brahmaṇi mānaṃ na veti saṃśaye 'nnajyotiṣoḥ saṃkhyādṛṣṭikriyāyāṃ vikalpe 'pi kāraṇe vastunyasadvā sadvā
GSP33brsgor1u:5768: pūrvapakṣe samanvayāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5787: tadidaṃ jagaddha kila tarhi prākkāle 'vyākṛtaṃ kāraṇātmakāmāsīt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5791: tatra sṛṣṭau virodhamaṅgīkṛtya sraṣṭari virodhaṃ pariharati-satyapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5792: ākāśādiṣu brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatve virodho naivāstīti pratijñāyāṃ hetumāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5801: yathā taittirīyake sarvajñatvādikaṃ kāraṇasya tathā chāndogyādāvapi dṛśyata ityāha-tadatra yallakṣaṇamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5804: tathāpi kārye virodhātkāraṇe 'pi virodhaḥ syādityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-kāryaviṣayaṃ tvityādinā
GSP33brsgor1u:5805: svapnasṛṣṭīnāṃ pratyahamanyathātvena so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyamāne draṣṭaryapi nānātvaṃ prasajyetetyāha-atiprasaṅgāditi
GSP33brsgor1u:5810: phalavadbrahmavākyaśeṣatvena sṛṣṭivākyānāmarthavattvasaṃbhavānna svārthe pṛthakphalaṃ kalpyaṃ, vākyabhedāpatterityāha-naca kalpayitumiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5812: śuṅgena kāryeṇa liṅgena kāraṇabrahmajñānārthatvaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmuktvā kāraṇasyādvayatvajñānaṃ phalāntamāha-mṛdādīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5813: evaṃ niṣphalāyāmanyārthāyāṃ sṛṣṭau tātparyābhāvādvirodho na doṣa ityatra
GSP33brsgor1u:5824: evaṃ sṛṣṭidvārakaṃ virodhamutsūtraṃ samādhāya kāraṇasya sadasattvādinā sākṣācchrutivirodhanirāsārthaṃ sūtramādatte-yatpunariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5825: yato 'stitvalakṣaṇaṃ brahma nirdhārya tasminneva ślokamudāharati, ato 'tra
GSP33brsgor1u:5827: tat tatra sadātmani śloko mantro bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:5833: nanvasatpadalakṣaṇā na yuktā, śrutibhireva svamatabhedenoditānuditahomavadvikalpasya darśitatvādityata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5835: eke śākhina ityartho na bhavati, kintu anādisaṃsāracakrasthā vedabāhyā
GSP33brsgor1u:5837: śūnyanirāsena śrutibhiḥ sadvādasyaiveṣṭatvāttāsāṃ virodhasphūrtinirāsāya lakṣaṇā yukteti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5840: nanu kartrabhāva eva parāmṛśyata ityata āha-cetanasya cāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5841: cakṣurdraṣṭā, śrotraṃ śrotā, mano mantetyucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5844: nanu karmakārakādanyasya kartuḥ sattve karmaṇa eva kartṛvācilakāro viruddha ityata āha-vyākriyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5847: vyākriyate jagatsvayameva niṣpannamiti vyākhyāya kenacidvyākṛtamiti vyācaṣṭe-yadveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5854: balākāyā apatyaṃ bālākirbrāhmaṇastaṃ prati rājovāca-yo vā iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5855: na kevalamādityādīnāṃ kartā kintu sarvasya jagata ityāha-yasyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5860: iha tu vākyabhedāt 'brahma te bravāṇi'iti bālākivākyasthabrahmaśabdena prāṇādiśabdo brahmaparatvena netumāśakya iti pratyudāharaṇena
GSP33brsgor1u:5862: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya prāṇādyupāstiparatvādbrahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ siddhānte jñeye samanvayasiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5865: śrutaṃ puruṣakartṛtvaṃ prāṇasya kathamityata āha-ye caita iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5866: sūtrātmakaprāṇasya vikāraḥ sūryādaya ityatra mānamāha-kratama iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5867: yasya mahimānaḥ sarve devā iti pūrvavākye darśitaṃ, ataḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5872: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5874: taṃ rājā he bṛhatpāṇḍaravāsaḥ somarājannityāmantrya saṃbodhya saṃbodhanānabhijñatvāt prāṇāderanātmatvamuktvā yaṣṭhyāghātenotthāpya jīvaṃ bodhitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5875: śroṣṭhī pradhānaḥ svairbhṛtyairjñātibhirupahṛtaṃ bhuṅkte svāḥ jñātayaśca
GSP33brsgor1u:5876: tamupajīvanti, evaṃ jīvo 'pi ādityādibhiḥ prakāśādinā bhogopakaraṇairbhuṅkte te ca havirgrahaṇādinā jīvamupajīvantītyuktaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5877: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo jīve kathamityata
GSP33brsgor1u:5880: sa ca bālākirbrahmatvabhrāntyā vyaṣṭiliṅgarūpānpuruṣānuktvā rājñā nirastastūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5881: tvaduktaṃ brahma mṛṣetyuktvā rājñocyamānaṃ brahmaiveti vaktavyamanyathārājño 'pi mṛṣāvāditvaprasaṅgādityāha-yadi so 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5888: atra prakaraṇopapadayorasattvātkasya grahaṇamiti saṃśaye puruṣakartṛpadasāṃnidhyāt kriyata iti yogājjagadgrahaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5891: nanu puruṣotpādakasya karturvyāpāraḥ karotyarthaṃ utpādanaṃ tasyaphalaṃ puruṣajanma tadanyataravācī karmaśabdo 'stvityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5895: prakaraṇādikaṃ hi sarvanāmnaḥ saṃkocakaṃ, tasminnasati sāmānyena buddhisthaṃ sarvameva gṛhyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5896: atra ca saṃkocakāsattvātsarvārthakena sarvanāmnā buddhisthasya kāryamātrasya karmaśabdo vācaka ityāha-tathāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5901: brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyāḥ parivrājakāścetyatra yathā brahmaṇaśabdaḥ parivrājakānyaviṣayaḥ tathātra karmaśabdaḥ puruṣānyajagadvācītyāha-evamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:5902: astu jagatkartā veditavyaḥ, parameśvarasya kimāyātamityata āha-parameśvareti //16//
GSP33brsgor1u:5910: 'saṃbhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedo hi neṣyate'ityuktaṃ cet punaruktiḥ syāditi śaṅkate-nanvevamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:5911: karmapadasya rūḍhyā pūrvapakṣaprāptau tannirāsārthamasyārambho yukta ityāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5916: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke |
GSP33brsgor1u:5920: he bālāke, etacchayanaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathaiṣa puruṣaḥ kvāśayiṣṭa /
GSP33brsgor1u:5923: etadbhavanamekībhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā eṣa puruṣaḥ kvābhūtsuptaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5926: etadāgamanamaikyabhraṃśarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā puruṣaḥ kuta āgata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5929: uttare prāṇokteḥ praśno 'pi prāṇaviśaya ityata āha-suṣuptikāle ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5936: nanu tatrākāśaḥ suṣuptisthānamuktaṃ na brahmetyata āha-ākāśeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5938: evaṃ jīvanirāsārthakatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya prāṇanirāsaparatvenāpi vyācaṣṭe-prāṇeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5941: api caike śākhina evameva prāṇātiriktaṃ jīvātmānamāmanantaḥ prāṇasya vākyārthatvaṃ vārayantīti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5955: yathā 'brahma te bravāṇi'ityupakramabalādvākyasya brahmaparatvaṃ tathātra jīvopakramādasya vākyasya jīvaparatvamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5957: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya jīvopāstiparatvaṃ, siddhānte jñeye pratyagbrahmaṇi
GSP33brsgor1u:5964: etebhyaḥkāryakāraṇātmanā jāyamānebhyo bhūtebhayaḥ sāmyenotthāya bhūtopādhikaṃ janmānubhūya tānyeva bhūtāni nīyamānānyanusṛtya vinaśyati /
GSP33brsgor1u:5974_1: na bhidyante, evamātmabhānabhāsyaṃ sarvamātmamātramiti niścitamityāha-dundubhyāditi evamekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāyā
GSP33brsgor1u:5978: ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5979: kiñca 'sa yathā sarvāsāmapāṃ samudra ekāyanam'iti kaṇḍikayā sarvaprapañcasya mukhyalayādhāratvamātmano
GSP33brsgor1u:5991: nanu saṃsārasyaupādhikatvāt sarvadaivābheda ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntabalena saṃsārasya svābhāvikatvamityāha-kvacicceti
GSP33brsgor1u:5992: 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudrestaṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya'iti
GSP33brsgor1u:5998: atyantābhedajñāpanārthaṃ jīvamupakramya draṣṭavyatvādayo brahmadharmā uktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6004: jīvoddeśena brahmatvapratipādane bhedo 'pyāvaśyaka iti bhedābhedaśaṅkāprāptau kalpitabhedenoddeśyatvādikaṃ svato 'tyantābheda iti jñāpanārthamasyārambhāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6005: jñāpane cātra liṅgamātmaśabdenopakrāntasya jīvasya dharmiṇo brahmaṇo dharmyantarasya grahaṇaṃ vinaiva brahmadharmakathanaṃ bhedābhede dharmidvayagrahaḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6007_0: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kāryāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā teṣaṃ nāmāni ca kṛtvā teṣu buddhyādiṣu praviśyābhivadanādikaṃ kurvan yo vartate tadvidvānihaivāmṛto
GSP33brsgor1u:6007_1: bhavatīti mantro 'pi jīvaparayoraikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-mantreti jīvasya brahmavikāratvānnaikyamityata āha-naca teja iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6016: kalpitasya bhedasya jñānānnivṛttiḥ saṃbhavati na satyasyetyapi draṣṭavyam
GSP33brsgor1u:6019: utpattiśrutyā jīvasya brahmaṇā bhedābhedāvityata āha-ata eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6021: atra pūrvapakṣe bījatrayamuktaṃ jīvenopakramaḥ parasyaiva samutthānaśrutyā jīvābhedābhidhānaṃ vijñātṛśabdaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6029: mṛtasya saṃjñā nāstīti vākye 'traiva māṃ mohitavānasi jñānarūpasyātmano
GSP33brsgor1u:6030: jñānābhāve nāśaprasaṅgāditi maitreyyokto munirāha-na vā are iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6031: mohaṃ mohakaraṃ vākyam, avināśī nāśahetuśūnyaḥ, ata ucchittidharmā nāśavānna bhavatītyanucchittidharmetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6034_0: kāśakṛtsnasya mate tvatyantābhedādvijñānasya kārakābhāvātsa yukta iti śrutyanusāritvāttanmate manaḥkalpitaṃ vijñātṛtvaṃ mukte
GSP33brsgor1u:6034_1: brahmātmani bhūtapūrvagatyoktamiti pariharaṇīyamityarthaḥ kiñca pūrvāparaparyālocanayā vākyasya muktātmaparatvāvagamādvijñātṛtvaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:6034_2: kalpitamevānūdyata iti na talliṅgena jīvaparatvamityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6035: ārṣeṣu pakṣeṣu kāśakṛtsnapakṣasyaivādeyatve kiṃ bījaṃ, tadāha-darśitamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:6038: hetūnāṃ bhedo na paramārthika iti pratijñayā saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6039: bhedābhedapakṣe jīvasya janmādivikāravattvāttanniṣedho na syādityāha-sa vā eṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6040: bhedasya satyatve tatpramayā bādhādahaṃ brahmeti nirvādhaṃ jñānaṃ na syādityāha-anyathāceti
GSP33brsgor1u:6046: ātyantikaikatve hi prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati na bhedābhedayoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6051: kiñcāvidyātajjabuddhirūpāyāṃ guhāyāṃ sthito jīvo bhavati, tasyāmeva brahma nihitamiti śruteḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6055: nanvekasyāṃ guhāyāṃ dvau kiṃ na syātāmityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6057: nanvatyantābhede jīvasya spaṣṭabhānādbrahmāpi spaṣṭaṃ syādataḥ spaṣṭatvāspaṣṭatvābhyāṃ tayorbheda iti cet /
GSP33brsgor1u:6059: darpaṇe pratibimbasya sphuṭatve 'pi bimbasyāsphuṭatvavat kalpitabhedena viruddhadharmavyavasthopapatteḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6062: vedāntārthastadbodha eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ tasya bādho na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6063: kiñca bhedābhadavādino jñānakarmabhyāṃ kṛtakaṃ mokṣaṃ kalpayanti,
GSP33brsgor1u:6065: yattu kṛtakamapi nityamiti, tacca 'yat kriyāsādhyaṃ tadanityam'iti
GSP33brsgor1u:6067: asmākaṃ tvanarthadhvaṃsasya jñānasādhyatvānnityamuktātmamātratvācca nānityatvadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6074: tatra hi brahmaṇo buddhisthatvārthaṃ sāmānyato jagatkāraṇatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:6075: lakṣaṇamuktaṃ, tena buddhisthe brahmaṇi kṛtasnavedāntasamanvayaṃ pratipādya tatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ kartṛtvamātramuta prakṛtitvakartṛtvobhayarūpamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6078: yadyapi tadānantaryamasya yuktaṃ tathāpi niścitatātparyairvedāntaiḥ kartṛmātreśvaramatanirāsaḥ sukara iti samanvayānte idaṃ likhitam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6084: īkṣaṇaśrutyā kartṛtvaṃ niścitaṃ, tathā ca brahma na prakṛtiḥ, kartṛtvāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:6085: yo yatkartā sa tatprakṛtirna, yathā ghaṭakartā kulāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6088: jaganna brahmaprakṛtikaṃ, tadvilakṣaṇatvāt, yaditthaṃ tattathā kulālavilakṣaṇaghaṭavadityāha-kāryaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6089: niṣkalaṃ niravayavaṃ, niṣkriyamacalaṃ, śāntamapariṇāmi, niravadyaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6097: kartṛjñānādapi sarvakāryajñānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nimittakāraṇāvyatirekastviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6104: ghaṭaḥ sphuratītyanugatasphuraṇaṃ prakṛtistadatirikeṇa vikārā na santīti so 'yamartho yathā sphuṭaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa ucyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:6105: hanyamānadundubhijanyācchabdasāmānyādbāhyān viśeṣaśabdān sāmānyagrahaṇātirikeṇa pṛthaggrahītuṃ śrotā na śaknuyāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6106: sāmānyasya tu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātajaśabdaviśeṣo gṛhīto bhavati, tasya vā grahaṇena tadavāntaraviśeṣaśabdo gṛhīto bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:6107: ataḥ śabdasāmānyagrahaṇagrahyā viśeṣāḥ sāmānye kalpitāḥ tadvadātmabhānabhāsyā ghaṭādaya ātmani kalpitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6109: 'yato vā'ityatra śrutau yata iti pañcamī prakṛtau draṣṭavyetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6112: evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvaṃ prasādhya kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati-nimittatvamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6132: nanu kṛterāśrayaḥsiddhobhavati viṣayastu sādhya ityekasyobhayaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6133: yathā mṛdaḥ sādhyapariṇāmābhedena kṛtiviṣayatvaṃ tadvadātmana ityāha-pariṇāmāditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6137: nanu brahmaṇa ātmānamiti dvitīyayā kāryātmanā sādhyatvaśrutyāstu prakṛtitvaṃ kartā tvanyo 'stvityata āha-svayamiti ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6138: brahmaṇaḥ kṛtikarmatvopapādanārthaṃ pariṇāmāditi padaṃ vyākhyāyānyathāpi vyācaṣṭe-pṛthaksūtramiti
GSP33brsgor1u:6139: mṛdghaṭa itivadbrahma sacca tyacceti pariṇāmasāmānādhikaraṇyaśruterbrahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6140: satpratyakṣaṃ bhūtatrayaṃ, tyaparokṣaṃ bhūtadvayaṃ, niruktaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:6141: ghaṭādi, aniruktaṃ vaktumaśakyaṃ kapotarūpādikaṃ ca brahmaivābhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6148: kartāraṃ kriyāśaktimantaṃ, īśaṃ niyantāraṃ, puruṣaṃ pratyañcaṃ, brahma
GSP33brsgor1u:6149: pūrṇaṃ, yoniṃ prakṛtiṃ, dhīrā dhyānena paśyantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6150: nanvanupādāne 'pi strīyonau yoniśabdo dṛṣṭa ityata āha-strīyoneriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6154: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ, sthānaṃ mayā akāri
GSP33brsgor1u:6157: nanvanumānasya śrutyanapekṣatvānna tayā bādha ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6158: jagatkartā pakṣaḥ śrutyaiva siddhyati, yā kṛtiḥ sā śarīrajanyeti vyāptivirodhena nityakṛtimato 'numānāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6159: ataḥ śrautamīśvaraṃ pakṣīkṛtyānupādānatvasādhane bhavatyevopajīvyayā prakṛtitvabodhakaśrutyā bādha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6162: ata ubhayarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamiti siddhām //27//
GSP33brsgor1u:6171: tathā hi chāndogye jagatkāraṇatvajñāpanārthaṃ pitā putramuvāca, āsāṃ vaṭadhānānāṃ madhye ekāṃ bhindhīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6173: punaḥ pitrā kimatra paśyasītyukte na kiñcana bhagava ityāha /
GSP33brsgor1u:6174: tatra pitrāṇimānaṃ na paśyasītyuktaṃ, tathā ca na
GSP33brsgor1u:6177: atrāṇvādivādāḥ śrautā na veti saṃśaye satyasadaṇvādiśabdabalācchrautā iti prāpte 'tidiśati-eteneti
GSP33brsgor1u:6182: tasminnaiva sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti siddham //28//
GSP33brsgor1u:6184: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya yaturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
